column18: description

Located next to Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia Station, this boutique hotel offers a stylish lounge. Rooms include a flat-screen TV and free WiFi.
The Sixtytwo Hotel is set in a characteristic 19th-century building. Each elegant room comes with a Nespresso coffee machine and a mini-bar. Some overlook Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, while others overlook the hotel´s charming Japanese-style garden.
A continental breakfast is served daily at a cafe nearby. Staff at the 24-hour reception can help arrange car hire.
This boutique hotel offers 45 spacious and stylish rooms. It is located in Barcelona's famous Passeig de Gràcia, next to Diagonal Avenue, the city’s best shopping area, where you can also find a wide variety of restaurants and tapas bars.
Hotel Sixtytwo is across the road from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló, and La Pedrera is just 3 minutes' walk away. It is just a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya. Nearby Passeig de Gràcia Station offers Metro services and direct airport trains.

column10: The Level Grand Premium Room City View
column18:
One of Barcelona’s tallest buildings, this design hotel offers spectacular views over the city and sea. Melia Barcelona Sky features an outdoor swimming pool. Treatments are available at the Serena SPA Wellness and free access is offered to the gym.
Each spacious room at Melia Barcelona Sky includes a 32-inch plasma-screen TV and offers city views. The stylish bathrooms come with a rain shower.
You can enjoy a cocktail on the 24th floor, at the Skyline 24 Panoramic Terrace, which offers views over the city.
El Merkado Restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine, and you can enjoy a cocktail on its terrace. WiFi is free in all areas.
Located in the lively area of Poblenou, Melia Barcelona Sky is just 656 feet from Poble Nou Metro Station. The Forum and the International Convention Center are within a 15-minute walk. The Mar Bella beach is only 10 minutes' walk of the hotel.

In a prime location in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Hotel Sansi Barcelona is located a 7-minute walk from Plaça Catalunya, 500 yards from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and a 6-minute walk from Casa Batllo. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is a 5-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia, and within 600 yards of the city center.
The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath.
Popular points of interest near Hotel Sansi Barcelona include Boqueria Market, Tivoli Theatre and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The nearest airport is Barcelona-El Prat Airport, 8.1 miles from the accommodation.

Hotel Alimara is a modern hotel located in Barcelona’s Horta district. It has a central garden, several meeting rooms, rooms with flat-screen TVs, and a fitness center.
All rooms at the Alimara Hotel have both air conditioning and heating. They all have a private bathroom with hairdryer.
The Alimara’s restaurant serves Mediterranean food with a modern twist and there are children’s menus available. The hotel bar, SUMMUM, features a terrace and serves food, drinks and snacks.
The hotel is located 1 minutes' walk from Mundet Metro Station, and it is a 12-minute journey into central Barcelona. Gaudí’s iconic Parc Güell is 4 Metro stops away from Mundet.

Set 3 metro stops from central Barcelona, the Atenas Catalonia has a rooftop swimming pool, offering views of the nearby Torre Agbar and Sagrada Familia. It also features free WiFi, a gym and a spa with a Turkish bath.
The bright rooms of Hotel Atenas Barcelona have simple décor with wooden flooring. Each has air conditioning, a mini fridge with complimentary water, and satellite TV.
The hotel's buffet breakfast features a show kitchen. There is a snack bar and guests can enjoy stunning city views from the pool, set on the 11th floor.
The Sagrada Familia is just over one mile from the hotel, while Glòries shopping center can be reached in 15 minutes by foot.
The Catalonia Atenas has a convenient left luggage service, on-site parking, and is 2 minutes’ walk from Clot Metro Station; and 656 feet from Clot Train Station; here you can take a direct train to Barcelona Airport.

Located 10 minutes' walk from the Arc de Triomf Metro and Train Station, the Ilunion Auditori features a rooftop swimming pool 9.8 ft wide by 16 ft long and gym. Free WiFi is available throughout.
All modern rooms at the Auditori have wooden floors, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a safe. The private bathrooms include a hairdryer and free toiletries.
This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment.
The Ilunion Auditori serves a daily breakfast and offers à- la-carte dishes made with seasonal products. There is also a special menu for celiac and food intolerant guests. Room service is available during limited hours, and a snack bar is open during the evening. A range of restaurants and bars can be found in the nearby areas of the Eixample, Born and Gothic Quarter.
Guests can enjoy a work out at the gym, which is equipped with cardiovascular equipment. The seasonal rooftop pool, which is surrounded by sun loungers, offers the ideal place for relaxation with stunning views over the city.
Free internet access is available at the computers in the reception area. The famous Barcelona Auditorium is a 5-minute walk away, while the the Sagrada Familia and the Ciutadella Park are 0.9 mi away. Underground private parking is available on site for an additional charge.
This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

A 15-minute walk from Gaudí's Sagrada Família, Catalonia Sagrada Familia is just 984 feet from Clot Metro and Train Station. It features a restaurant, a seasonal outdoor pool and a gym.
The Catalonia Sagrada Familia features traditional, bright décor and its rooms are have a desk, a mini fridge with complimentary water and a safety deposit box. Free Wi-Fi access is available.
All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.
The restaurant serves a range of Catalan and Mediterranean cuisine, as well as a buffet breakfast. The café-bar offers a selection of drinks and snacks throughout the day and there is also a bar.
Car hire is available on site, and staff at the Catalonia Sagrada Familia’s 24-hour reception can provide information on Barcelona and its many attractions. The hotel is 656 feet from the Torre Agbar Tower.
Clot Metro Station connects guests to the city center in 4 stops and the airport train also stops here.

Located in Barcelona, a 10-minute walk from Bogatell Beach, Acta Voraport has accommodations with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. With a bar, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property provides an ATM, a concierge service and organizing tours for guests.
At the hotel, all rooms include a desk and a flat-screen TV. Each room is equipped with a safety deposit box and some have city views. At Acta Voraport the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels.
Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.
Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk.
Popular points of interest near Acta Voraport include Mar Bella Beach, Nova Icaria Beach and Somorrostro Beach. The nearest airport is Barcelona-El Prat Airport, 9.3 miles from the hotel.

Located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, this 19th-century building offers stylish modern interiors and free WiFi. It is just 984 feet from the designer shops and Gaudí buildings of Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard.
The Catalonia Eixample 1864 is housed in one of the Eixample’s oldest buildings, and its painted façade gives it the Specialty Monument status.
All soundproofed rooms with attached bathroom sleek wooden floors and furniture, air conditioning and all rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.. Some rooms have a private terrace and pool.
A buffet breakfast with show cooking is offered every morning at the Sala Minerva; while the hotel's Les Finestres de Llúria restaurant serves traditional Catalan food with a creative twist. Room service is also available.
Catalonia Eixample 1864 features a rooftop swimming pool, sundeck and bar; as well as a gym.
The Catalonia Eixample 1864 is ideally located just a 5-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia Station. Plaza Catalunya Square is a 10-minute walk away.
The hotel offers private parking on-site for an extra cost and an electric vehicle charging station.

Zenit Barcelona is 820 feet from Plaza Francesc Macià on Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue. This modern hotel offers stylish air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms, with free Wi-Fi and a pillow menu.
The Zenit is a 15-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, where Gaudí’s famous La Pedrera and Casa Batlló can be found. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are a further 15 minutes’ walk away.
Rooms at the Zenit Barcelona feature satellite TV and a safe and mini-bar. There is a work desk and a kettle with free tea and coffee set; the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.
Zenit Hotel’s restaurant offers gourmet Spanish and international cuisine. A special gluten-free breakfast and children's menus are available, and packed lunches and room service can be requested.
There is a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. A laundry, dry cleaning and ironing service is offered. Parking is available 10 minutes' walk away, for an extra cost.

This minimalist hotel is located in the Poble Nou district of Barcelona, 15 minutes’ by foot from Bogatell Beach. It offers a seasonal outdoor pool surrounded by wooden decking and loungers.
The suites at Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpica Suites feature monochrome decoration and a flat-screen TV. They also include air conditioning and a modern bathroom.
The Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpica Suites complex offers a stylish café-bar and restaurant. Guests can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine from the á la carte and daily menus. In summer meals can be enjoyed on the terrace by the pool.
Guests have access to the hotel's large spa for an additional cost. It includes an indoor treatment pool, Finnish sauna, Turkish baths, jacuzzis, hot tubs, several types of shower and an ice fountain. There is also a gym.
Barcelona Port is 15 minutes' walk away and Bogatell Metro Station is 328 feet from the hotel. Guests can walk to the lively Villa Olimpica area in 5 minutes.
All rooms include 1 complimentary access per person per stay to the hotel spa (subject to availability and upon reservation).

column4: Four Points by Sheraton Barcelona Diagonal
column10: Preferred King Room with City View
column17: Four Points by Sheraton Barcelona Diagonal
column18:
Four Points by Sheraton Barcelona Diagonal is just under a quarter of a mile from Glòries Shopping Center, in the modern 22@ district of Barcelona. It features an elegant restaurant and soundproof rooms with free Wi-Fi and TV.
Rooms at the Four Points Barcelona Diagonal are bright and spacious, with hardwood floors. Each room has a stylish bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. Rooms on higher floors offer great views, some of the Sagrada Familia.
La Avenida Restaurant serves traditional Spanish cuisine. A varied buffet breakfast is offered daily, and free coffee is available from 5 am until 7 am. Taste local craft beers, snacks and enjoy the best sports games at 4Taps Bar.
The Four Points Diagonal is less than half a mile from the colorful Agbar Tower, designed by Jean Nouvel. There are many bars and restaurants on nearby Rambla del Poblenou, and Bogatell Beach is within a 15-minute walk. Poblenou Metro Station is just over a quarter mile away.

This hotel is located next to Avinguda Diagonal and Passeig de Gràcia, ideal for shopping. Guests can easily access Plaza Cataluña and the city’s historic gothic quarter. Free Wi-Fi is available.
Located along the modernist route, Hotel Catalonia Gracia is surrounded by much of the interesting architecture that Barcelona is famous for, such as Gaudí and Domenech i Muntaner's key buildings, including La Pedrera.
A buffet breakfast is available at the on-site restaurant; room service is also available.
Guests can easily enjoy this cosmopolitan city as Hotel Catalonia Gracia is within walking distance of Barcelona’s many attractions. As well as the excellent public transport links providing swift access to the entire city and the surrounding area, the hotel offers great value for money. The hotel also includes meeting amenities and conference rooms available for business events and banquets.

Set in Barcelona’s Born District, right beside Ciutadella Park, Motel One Barcelona-Ciutadella offers modern, air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and an interactive TV.
Motel One Barcelona-Ciutadella features a 24-hour lounge bar and a continental breakfast is available each morning at the property. The hotel also has a rooftop terrace with views of Ciutadella Park, the sea and the Barcelona skyline.
Plaça Catalunya and the Ramblas can be reached in a 20-minute walk, as can Barcelona’s Olympic Port. The Sagrada Familia is 30 minutes’ walk away.
Arc de Triomf metro and train station is just 1312 feet away. Motel One is only 20 minutes from the International Convention Center – CCIB FORUM and 30 minutes from the Fira Barcelona Exhibition Center in public transport.

Featuring a sunroof terrace with a pool and views over Barcelona, Catalonia Park Putxet offers tranquil rooms and a modern fitness center onsite. There is free WiFi available throughout.
The Park Putxet has simple, bright décor. Each air-conditioned room comes with a mini fridge with complimentary water, a satellite TV and a fully equipped bathroom with a hairdryer.
You can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast with Show Cooking. Light meals are prepared at the hotel snack bar; and room service, including sushi room service, is available.
The hotel is located in a residential area. There is a wide selection of cafés, bars and restaurants in the neighboring district of Gràcia, which is just 15 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Gaudi's famous Park Guell is just 1969 feet away. The closest metro station is Lesseps, 1969 feet away.

Located in Barcelona, 0.9 mi from Sagrada Familia, Golden Hotel Barcelona is a sustainable property with the Biosphere certificate. It provides a rooftop terrace with outdoor swimming pool, jacuzzi and bar. 0.9 mi from Port Olympic, the property is also 1.1 mi from Sagarda Familia and 1.2 mi away from Picasso Museum. There is a gym, a restaurant and a shared lounge.
 All guests staying at the Golden Hotel Barcelona get 1 free entry for person and stay to the spa at Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpic@ Suites complex (subject to availability and with prior reservation), located 1476 feet away.
A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the property.
Speaking Spanish, Catalan, German and English at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock.
Barcelona El Prat Airport is 9.3 mi from the property.

Astoria is just off Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue, a 5-minute walk from Diagonal Metro Station and Paseo de Gracia Avenue. It features a rooftop pool with views, and a gym.
The Astoria Hotel combines original Art Nouveau features with modern facilities. Air-conditioned rooms have satellite TV, a safe and mini-bar. They feature wooden floors and free Wi-Fi, and the modern bathrooms come with a hairdryer.
The restaurant at the Astoria offers traditional Catalan cuisine, and room service is available. There is also a terrace and a bar.
There is a 24-hour front desk

Located 656 feet from Las Ramblas in central Barcelona, Catalonia Avinyo features a rooftop pool and gym. It offers chic, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.
Rooms are decorated in a modern, minimalist style with large wall photos. They include a mini-bar, safe and telephone. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app. The modern bathrooms have a shower and a hairdryer.
Barceloneta Beach is a 15-minute walk from Hotel Catalonia Avinyo. The Liceu and Jaume I Metro Stations are just 984 feet away and Barcelona Cathedral is 4 minutes' walk away.
The Avinyo’s central location means there are many shops, bars and restaurants close to the hotel. Bicycle and car hire can be arranged at the tour desk.

Set in a 19th-century building in Barcelona’s El Born district, Catalonia Born offers a rooftop pool, an attractive central courtyard and free Wi-Fi. Arc de Triomf Metro Station is 820 feet away.
The classic rooms at Catalonia Born Hotel come with an elegant marble bathroom. They also include a satellite TV and centrally controlled heating or air conditioning, depending on the season.
A buffet breakfast is served, and the snack bar is open for lunch and dinner. There is also a bar in the lobby.
Located minutes from França Train Station, the hotel is well-connected to the rest of the city and its surroundings. Car rental is also available from the tour desk.

This modern hotel is located 215 yards from Barcelona’s Monumental Bull Ring and 12 minutes from the Sagrada Familia. The rooms all have air conditioning and heating, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.
Monumental Metro Station is just a 3-minute walk from Hotel Glòries, and provides direct connections to Plaza Catalunya in around 5 minutes.
The hotel is well located to get to the 22@ high-tech area, as well as the Agbar Tower. The National Theatre of Catalunya and the Auditori Concert Hall are just a quarter mile away.
The Hotel Glòries’s 24-hour front desk provides car and bike rental. They can also exchange currency and reserve tickets.

Located in the quiet San Gervasi district of Barcelona, this elegant hotel offers modern rooms with free internet connection. The Silken is just 8 minutes by train from Plaza Catalunya.
The restaurant at Silken San Gervasi offers traditional cuisine with modern influences. A breakfast buffet is served in the cafeteria, and drinks and snacks are also available throughout the day.
Functional rooms include a free safe and central heating and air conditioning. The marble bathroom is complete with a hairdryer.
Silken St. Gervasi is a 15-minute walk from Park Guell, with impressive structures, mosaics and architecture by Antoni Gaudí. El Putxet Station can be found 164 feet from the hotel with direct access to the city center.

Located just 2 blocks from the Sagrada Familia, this hotel has a rooftop terrace overlooking Gaudí’s world-famous temple. It offers 24-hour reception and rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.
The air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Sagrada Familia feature parquet floors and modern furniture. They are equipped with a mini-bar and the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.
Glòries Shopping Center and Arc de Triomf are under 20 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Sagrada Familia Metro Station, located a 3-minute walk away, connects you with the city center in 5 minutes.

The Acta Antibes is set in Barcelona’s Eixample District, 10 minutes’ walk from the Sagrada Familia. This hotel features a 24-hour reception, buffet breakfast and free Wi-Fi.
Each of the Acta Antibes’s rooms has simple, stylish décor and wooden flooring. All air-conditioned rooms have a TV and a desk.
While visiting the city’s tourist attractions, guests at the Antibes can make use of its luggage storage. A gluten-free breakfast is available upon request.
The hotel is ideally located for visiting sights such as Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera, which are around 20 minutes’ walk away.
Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are just over one mile away. The nearest Metro station, Monumental, is just 656 feet from the hotel.

column4: Hotel Granados 83, a Member of Design Hotels
column17: Hotel Granados 83, a Member of Design Hotels
column18:
Located 820 feet from Barcelona’s Diagonal Metro Station, Granados 83 offers a small gym and roof terrace with a small pool and cocktail bar. Rooms feature Zen-style design and LCD TV.
This design hotel has an impressive glass and stone façade and it combines neoclassical details with industrial and natural components which has become representative of the entire city and which gives it the Specialty Monument status. It also features beautiful Art Deco interiors.
Decorated with wood, leather and glass, the Granados 83’s stylish air-conditioned rooms include a mini-bar, bathrobe and slippers.
There are many popular tapas bars within a 5-minute walk, on Rambla de Catalunya.
Passeig de Gràcia is 1312 feet away, and is home to Gaudí’s famous La Pedrera and Casa Batlló.
There is a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. On-site parking is offered for an extra charge.

Catalonia Barcelona 505 offers spacious rooms with free Wi-Fi and an outdoor swimming pool in Barcelona’s Sant Gervasi area. From El Putxet Train Station, 1312 feet away, you can reach the center in 15 minutes.
The hotel is close to important medical centers, such as the Teknon Clinic, Sant Jordi Clinic, Dexeus and Barraquer. It is also next to the Blue Tram, which takes you to the cable car for Tibidabo.
Air-conditioned rooms have a satellite TV, a safe and mini-bar. There is a work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.
The restaurant C50&5 offers international cuisine. There is a bar and room service is available.
You can hire a car from the 24-hour front desk. On-site parking is offered for an additional charge, and the hotel has easy access to the B20 Motorway.

This stylish boutique hotel has colorful, modern rooms in the historic center of the city, just a 4-minute walk from Las Ramblas and Plaza Catalunya. There is a rooftop hot tub and terrace.
Guests at the Ciutat Vella enjoy free coffee. There is also a free internet terminal, and free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.
The rooms in the Ciutat Vella have large windows and flat-screen TVs. The bathrooms are modern and have showers.
Ciutat Vella’s central location makes it ideal for exploring Barcelona’s historic heart. Many great bars, cafes and restaurants are less than a 10-minute walk away. Universitat Metro Station is just 3 minutes away.

Located just 656 feet from Sagrera Metro Station in Sant Andreu, the modern Hotel Acta Laumon is 25 minutes from the center of Barcelona by metro.
It features stylish rooms with air conditioning, a plasma TV and a private bathroom. Free WiFi is offered. Hotel Acta Laumon also offers apartments, located in front of the hotel. Guests have access to the hotel facilities.
The hotel have a spacious lounge to rest, work or have a coffee.
There are also 24-hour vending machines for snacks and drinks.
The hotel offers tourist information and ticket services.

The stylish Catalonia Rigoletto is set 1640 feet from FC Barça’s Camp Nou stadium and 5 minutes’ walk from Maria Cristina Metro Station. It offers an outdoor pool and rooms with free WiFi and flat-screen TVs.
The Rigoletto’s spacious rooms are air conditioned and decorated with dark woods and luxurious fabrics. All rooms have satellite TV, free smartphone, a mini-bar and safety deposit box.
A buffet breakfast is on offer in the dining room and Mediterranean cuisine is served in the stylish La Traviata restaurant. There is also a bar in the hotel featuring attractive art work.
Sights including Las Ramblas and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló can be reached in 15 minutes, by Metro. Sants Railway Station, where there is an airport train connection, is just 0.9 mi from the Rigoletto.

Hesperia Barcelona Barri Gòtic is in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, just 328 feet from the port and 1640 feet from Las Ramblas.
Barceloneta Beach is a 15-minute stroll from the Hesperia Barcelona Barri Gotic.
Its bright, modern rooms offer free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. They also have air conditioning or heating and a safe. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and toiletries.
You can find a range of lively bars in the surrounding streets.
Barcelona Aquarium and Maremagnum Shopping Center are 2625 feet away.

Located 984 feet from L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Center, the Derby is a 20-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou stadium. Each air-conditioned room offers flat-screen satellite TV and free internet access.
The stylish Derby Hotel has an impressive collection of Catalan art, including pieces by Miró and Tàpies. Rooms have functional design and parquet flooring. They all include a safe and a mini-bar.
Hotel Derby features Italian pizzeria Santa Napoli and cocktail bar with Peruvian nuances Lima Bruja.
Located just 33 feet away, the Gran Derby Hotel allows guests access to its gym and swimming pool. Hospital Clinic Metro Station is 2625 feet away, while the Feria Trade Fair in Plaza Espanya can be reached in a 20-minute walk.

Conveniently located less than 10 minutes’ walk from Hospital Clinic Metro Station, Hotel Viladomat by Silken is located in Barcelona. This property features free WiFi and an on-site bar.
Each room at this property is air conditioned and has satellite TV, safe, desk, and mini-bar. The private bathroom includes a bath, shower, hairdryer, and free toiletries.
Hotel Viladomat by Silken has a 24-hour front desk and offers a ticket service. A shuttle to the airport is available for an extra charge, and there is luggage storage on site.
Plaza Catalunya and Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas are 20 minutes away by foot. The friendly staff are happy to provide information on the city and its main points of interest. Sants Station is 0.6 mi away from Hotel Viladomat by Silken, with direct links to Barcelona Airport.

Zenit Borrell is in Barcelona’s Eixample district, a 15 minute walk from the stylish Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers modern, soundproof rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV.
The Marés restaurant offers Mediterranean and international cuisine, and has an elegant outdoor terrace. There is also a bar with a large TV screen.
All rooms at the Zenit Borrell have air conditioning and a minibar. The private bathrooms come equipped with a hairdryer.
The tour desk can provide useful information on Barcelona and the surrounding area. The hotel is 12 minutes from Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas by metro, while the Hospital Clinic Metro Station and hospital are 220 yards away from the hotel.

This motorcycle-friendly hotel is 3 Metro stops from Plaza Catalunya and 15 minutes’ walk from the Barcelona’s beaches. There is free WiFi available throughout.
Capri by Fraser Barcelona offers chic air-conditioned and spacious suites and apartments with a flat-screen cable TV and a seating area. There is a fully-equipped kitchenette, a work desk and a safe, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.
The property has a free self-service laundry room open 24 hours a day and a gym.
For guests coming by motorcycle, Capri by Fraser offers free indoor parking with direct elevator to the rooms and a “pit stop” service including complete toolkit for small repairs and chain lubricant, free suede, helmet visor cleaner, battery charger and compressor to check the pressure level of tires.
Capri by Fraser Barcelona offers a buffet breakfast every day and a set menu at lunch time during week days. Room service is also available.
The hotel has a 24-hour front desk.

Catalonia Albeniz offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and satellite TV. It is located 492 feet from Clot Train Station, and a 15-minute walk from Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia Church.
The property has a gym and an outdoor pool. You can also use the luggage storage facility on site at the Albeniz.
The varied buffet breakfast at the Catalonia Albeniz includes characteristic local dishes, such as potato omelet and bread with tomato.
The Albeniz offers bright, modern rooms with simple décor and wooden floors. Each room includes a mini-bar and a marble bathroom with a hair dryer, plus a safe. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.
Catalonia Albeniz is just 2297 feet from the shops and restaurants of Glòries Shopping Center, while Encants Flea Market is a 5-minute walk away. Metro services and direct airport trains are available from nearby Clot Station.

This design hotel is located 15 minutes’ from the beach, in the 22@ business area of Barcelona’s Poble Nou district. Bogatell Metro Station, 1148 feet away, connects with central Barcelona in 25 minutes.
The modern rooms at NH Barcelona Diagonal Center feature a flat-screen satellite TV, desk, mini-bar and safe. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer.
The hotel serves a buffet breakfast.
You will find cafés and restaurants on Poblenou Rambla, 10 minutes’ walk away. Glòries Shopping Center is also within a 10-minute walk.
This NH hotel features a 24-hour reception desk and a business center. Rooms and facilities are adapted for disabled guests. There is free Wi-Fi throughout.
Barcelona Airport is about 11 mi away, while CCIB Convention Center is 1.9 mi away. Car rental is available at the hotel and private parking is available at an additional cost.

Located on the seafront in Diagonal Mar, the Hesperia Barcelona del Mar (formerly Hesperia del Mar) features stylish rooms with free WiFi and satellite TV. It is a 5-minute walk from the CCIB and Diagonal Mar Shopping Center.
Air-conditioned rooms at Hesperia Barcelona del Mar come with flat-screen TV, safe, and a mini-bar. The private bathroom comes with a bath, hairdryer and free toiletries.
The Ramblas and Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter are only 3.1 mi from the hotel. Poble Nou Metro Station is a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

column4: Leonardo Boutique Hotel Barcelona Sagrada Familia
column17: Leonardo Boutique Hotel Barcelona Sagrada Familia
column18:
Leonardo Boutique Hotel Barcelona Sagrada Familia is located just 15 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s famous Sagrada Familia. It has a rooftop sun terrace with panoramic views of Barcelona and rooms with free Wi-Fi.
All modern, outward-facing rooms at theLeonardo Boutique Hotel Barcelona Sagrada Familia are equipped with air conditioning and heating. They have a flat-screen TV and the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.
Leonardo Boutique Hotel Barcelona Sagrada Familia serves a daily buffet breakfast, and gluten-free meals are available on prior request. In summer, breakfast can be enjoyed on the terrace. There are also vending machines with snacks and drinks.
Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. Clot Metro Station is 656 feet away, allowing you to reach the city center in 10 minutes.

Catalonia Diagonal Centro is set in the heart of Barcelona’s Eixample district, 984 feet from Diagonal Metro Station. It features a seasonal outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.
At the Catalonia Diagonal Centro, you can enjoy modern, comfortable accommodations next to some of Barcelona’s most popular sights. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app
Only 984 feet away on Passeig de Gràcia is La Pedrera, one of Gaudi’s famous creations. Take a stroll past the Modernista buildings to reach Plaça Catalunya and the lively Ramblas area.
Back at the hotel, relax in your stylish bedroom with contemporary wooden furniture and marble private bathroom. Watch satellite television or take advantage of the free wireless internet connection.
A short stroll from the hotel takes you to trendy Gràcia, with its bohemian shops and leafy squares, and a huge selection of bars and restaurants. Nearby metro and bus lines make it easy to see the whole of this cosmopolitan city.

column10: Superior Double or Twin Room with Terrace
column18:
Set next to Barcelona University on Gran Vía, Hotel Center Gran Via offers modern rooms in the center of Barcelona. It is within 5 minutes’ walk of Plaza de Catalunya, Las Ramblas and Passeig de Gràcia.
Set in the principal floor of a beautiful Modernist building, Hotel Center Gran Via features French balconies and high, painted ceilings. The rooms offer simple, contemporary décor.
All rooms at Hotel Center Gran Via are on the main floor, featuring an air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. Some rooms according to category have a balcony or a terrace.
Universitat Metro station is 328 feet from the hotel and the famous Sagrada Família is just 5 stops from here. The Gaudí houses, the Gothic Quarter and Born district can all be reached in 20 minutes by foot.
The airport bus stops 328 feet away and Catalunya Railway and Metro Station is less than 10 minutes’ walk from the Gran Via.

This spacious and modern hotel is located in Eixample district, built in 2004, the Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Gran Via, features wide-open public spaces covered in marble.
Rooms include flat-screen TV, Wifi, safebox, desk, mini-bar, private bathrooms with toiletries.
A good location for tourism, you can easily walk to the Gothic Quarter and Ramblas, or up to the attractions of Montjuic. The city’s major business districts are also nearby.
Rooms include satellite TV, free Wi-Fi access, air conditioning and a bathroom with free toiletries.
Parking is available on site at an additional cost.

column10: Interior Comfort Double or Twin Room
column18:
Open since 1840, Sant Agustí is set in a restored convent just 492 feet from Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas. It offers free Wi-Fi and functional air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV.
Each room at Hotel Sant Agustí has simple, modern design and wooden flooring. Rooms come with a safe and a bathroom with toiletries and a hairdryer. Some rooms have a private balcony.
The Sant Agustí serves a daily continental buffet breakfast.
Downstairs there are computers which guests can use for free. Reception is also open 24 hours a day.
Set in a quiet square, the hotel is a 2-minute walk from Liceu Metro Station and La Boqueria Market. Plaza Catalunya is within 2297 feet and offers various bus and train connections, including direct airport busses.

Located next to Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia Boulevard, Catalonia Passeig de Gràcia 4* Sup offers an outdoor pool, a free gym, a terrace, free Wi-Fi and paid private parking.
All the rooms at Catalonia Passeig de Gràcia 4* Sup has a smart TV with Chromecast app.
The restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine with a selection of dishes from the "Gourmet Corner" menu. Gluten-free menus are available on request.
There is also a gastrobar and a bar with a cocktail menu. An electric vehicle charging station is available.
The property is 1640 feet from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló, 656 feet from Passeig de Gràcia Metro Station, 13-minute walk from La Pedrera and 7-minute walk from Palau de la Música Catalana. Airport busses can be reached within 1148 feet.
Airport busses leave from Plaza Catalunya, located 1148 feet away.

column4: Hotel Balmes, a member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts
column17: Hotel Balmes, a member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts
column18:
Balmes is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes’ walk from the famous Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers a swimming pool, a gym/fitness center and modern rooms with satellite TV.
The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Balmes feature parquet floors and smart, simple décor. They all come with a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi.
B Bar, like the rest of the hotel, is decorated with works of African art.
Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. There is a computer in the lobby which guests can use for free.
Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are both under 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel. You can walk to Las Ramblas and Barcelona’s charming Gothic Quarter in around 15 minutes.

Ibis Barcelona Plaza Glòries 22@ is located in Barcelona’s Glòries district, 1640 feet from Torre Agbar. It offers a fitness center, 24-hour bar and soundproofed rooms with a flat-screen TV.
All rooms at the Ibis Plaza Glòries have air conditioning and heating. They also have a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi is offered throughout.
The Hotel Ibis Plaza Glòries has a restaurant which serves a buffet breakfast. Rates with breakfast included does not include breakfast for children. Children under 12 can enjoy breakfast for 4 euros per person
Llacuna and Glòries Metro Stations are within 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel. From here you can reach Plaza Catalunya or Barceloneta Beach in under 10 minutes.

Acta Splendid is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas. It offers 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.
Staff at the Hotel Splendid’s 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. There is also a computer in the lobby that guests can use for free.
There is a public car park 1476 feet from the hotel, around a 7-minute walk. You can walk to the Palau de la Música Catalana, a Modernist auditorium and UNESCO World Heritage Site, in 15 minutes.
Gluten-free breakfasts are available upon request.

Located 1969 feet from Plaza Reial in Barcelona, Niu Barcelona Hotel features an outdoor pool on the rooftop. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property
Every room at this hotel comes with a flat-screen TV; while the private bathrooms come with shower and hairdryer. Rooms are air-conditioned in summer and heated in winter.
There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Guests benefit from a complimentary bottle of water upon arrival.
Portal de l'Angel is 2625 feet from Niu Barcelona Hotel, while Plaça Catalunya is 2953 feet from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 7.5 mi from Niu Barcelona Hotel.

This design hotel is a 5-minute walk from Barcelona’s Arc de Triomf Metro Station and Estació del Nord Bus Station.  It has a gym, and offers free Wi-Fi and free bottled water.
Rooms at the Sercotel Caspe are air-conditioned and soundproofed. They feature satellite TV, a mini-bar and safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.
The Sercotel Caspe has an outdoor terrace, an attractive restaurant and a café-bar. Room service is also available.
The hotel is a short walk from Gaudí's buildings on Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. Plaza Catalunya is approximately 20 minutes' walk away.
There is a tour desk and 24-hour reception. Car hire is available and there is on-site parking for an extra charge.

Offering quiet street views, Isabella's House in Barcelona offers accommodations and a bar. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk, and an elevator, along with free Wifi throughout the property. Outdoor dining is also possible at the condo hotel.
The condo hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a microwave, a toaster, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with a a bath or shower. There's also a dining area and a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge, a stovetop, and kitchenware. At the condo hotel, the units are equipped with bed linen and towels.
Sightseeing tours are available around the property.
La Pedrera is 1.9 miles from Isabella's House, while Sants Railway Station is 1.9 miles away. The nearest airport is Barcelona-El Prat Airport, 8.1 miles from the accommodation.

Catalonia Gran Via BCN is set on Gran Vía and within 5 minutes’ walk of Urgell and Universitat Metro Stations, and beside the airport bus stop. It features an outdoor swimming pool, a gym and free Wi-Fi.
Each of the modern rooms at Catalonia Gran Via BCN is themed around a different city and air travel. All rooms have flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and an iPod docking station.
You can enjoy breakfast in Catalonia Gran Via BCN, while à la carte options are offered in the Gourmet Corner.
You can walk to both Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas in 10 minutes. Plaza de España, the Magic Fountains and the FIRA are just 2 stops from Urgell Station.

Free Wi-Fi and a rooftop swimming pool are offered at Catalonia Park Güell. It is set in a residential area just outside Barcelona’s historic center, 1969 feet from Parc Güell.
Rooms at the hotel are simple and comfortable, with air conditioning or heated and satellite TV. There is also a restaurant, bar.
The Catalonia Park Güell is just 984 feet from Vallcarca Metro Station. This gives access to the city center within 10 minutes. Stops for busses V19 and 22 are nearby. The sun terrace offers views over the city.
The hotel is close to some of Barcelona’s most famous medical centers. These include the Delfos and Quiron Clinics.
There are many sports clubs and parks around the hotel. The popular Gràcia district is also a short walk away. It has lively squares with bars and restaurants.

With a small rooftop pool offering great views over Barcelona, Andante Hotel is centrally located 1148 feet from Drassanes Metro Station and La Rambla. It offers free Wi-Fi and a gym.
Modern air-conditioned rooms feature parquet floors, a laptop safe and flat-screen satellite TV. The bathroom comes with a full-length mirror and a high-powered hairdryer.
A buffet breakfast with show cooking is available. A gluten-free breakfast is available upon request. There is a self-service area with a microwave and vending machines for drinks, sandwiches and snacks, as well as a large terrace.
You can hire a car from the tour desk and a private shuttle from and to Barcelona El Prat Airport is available on prior request at an extra cost. There is a luggage storage room and a laundry and ironing service are offered.
The rooftop terrace will be closed for maintenance from January 15, 2024, to January 25, 2024.

Catalonia La Maquinista is ideally located next to the La Maquinista Shopping Center in Barcelona’s Sant Andreu District. Plaza de Catalunya is just a 15-minute Metro journey away.
The Maquinista’s bright rooms have air conditioning and flat-screen smart TV equipped with Chromecast app. All rooms have a work desk and safe. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.
The hotel restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and Mediterranean cuisine for lunch and dinner. The neighboring Maquinista Shopping Center has a selection of cinemas, a bowling alley, as well as cafés and bars.
Catalonia La Maquinista is 1640 feet from Barcelona’s ring road, the B10 Ronda del Litoral, connecting guests to the beach in 10 minutes.
Sant Andreu Metro and Railway Station is just a 10-minute walk from Catalonia La Maquinista and has direct trains to Passeig de Gràcia and to El Prat Airport. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are 8 Metro stops away.
As with reservations of more than 4 rooms, special conditions and supplements will apply to those of more than 8 nights.

Acta BCN 40 Hotel is centrally located 1148 feet from Barcelona’s Plaza Universitat, and a 5-minute walk from the Ramblas. It offers modern rooms with flat-screen satellite TVs.
Rooms at the Acta are air-conditioned in summer and heated in winter, and have a free safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities, and you can request an iron at reception.
Guests can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast in the hotel’s stylish breakfast room. A gluten-free breakfast is available upon request. There are many bars, shops and restaurants within a short walk of the hotel.
The Acta BCN 40 has a 24-hour front desk and offers luggage storage. Parking is available nearby for an extra charge.

Barcelona Center is 1312 feet from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia Avenue, and a 15-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya. Guests have free access to the small gym and rooftop hydromassage tub.
The modern rooms at the Barcelona Center Hotel have satellite TV and free WiFi. There is a mini-bar and safe, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.
The Center Hotel has a traditional Spanish restaurant. There is also a bar and a terrace.
There is a 24-hour front desk. Parking is available nearby for an additional charge.

column4: Hotel Gran Derby Suites, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World
column17: Hotel Gran Derby Suites, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World
column18:
This lovely red-brick building is perfectly located in a quiet area of Barcelona, and features an outdoor swimming pool and a fantastic collection of lithographs by Picasso, Dalí, Tàpies and others.
Each air-conditioned room at Hotel Gran Derby Suites features flat-screen satellite TV, a mini-bar and a private bathroom with a bathrobe, slippers and a hairdryer.
These two separate spaces allow guests to comfortably host visitors, hold meetings or work in their sophisticated rooms.
Sit back and relax around the outdoor swimming pool, where you will enjoy views of the pretty gardens.
The tour desk/ticket service and free wired internet make it easy to plan your days in Barcelona.
Take a short metro journey into the city center, or enjoy the tourist bus, which stops right next to the Gran Derby.
You can also stroll along to the fashionable Avinguda Diagonal. Here you will find the huge L'Illa shopping center, and a succession of stylish boutiques.
Hotel Gran Derby shares with Hotel Derby the Italian pizzeria Santa Napoli and the cocktail bar with Peruvian nuances Lima Bruja.

The Catalonia Catedral is set in a traditional Modernist building, just 328 feet from Barcelona Cathedral. It offers free use of Smartphones, Wi-Fi access, a rooftop seasonal pool and a Japanese-style terrace and garden.
The Catedral has stylish rooms, which have contemporary décor. Each has a flat-screen smart TV equipped with Chromecast app, air conditioning, a mini-bar, a Nespresso machine. A smartphone is available for guests during their stay free of charge.
The hotel’s Ascent Restaurant by Eboca serves Mediterrean cuisine and offers views of the nearby Palacio Pignatelli Art Gallery. There is also a bar in the hotel lobby where guests can use the computers with internet access and printers for free.
The Catalonia Catedral is around 10 minutes’ walk from landmarks such as Las Ramblas and Plaza de Catalunya Square. Barcelona’s Old Port and Marina are less than one mile away. Jaume I Metro Station is 5 minutes' walk away.

column4: Gran Hotel Havana 4Sup by Escampa Hotels
column10: Comfort Double or Twin Room (1-2 Adults)
column17: Gran Hotel Havana 4Sup by Escampa Hotels
column18:
This elegant, design hotel is set in Barcelona’s city center, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya. It features a sauna and a seasonal rooftop pool with a terrace.
The Gran Hotel Havana is located in Casa Fradera, a historic building dating from 1882. Rooms are decorated in a classic style and feature a marble bathroom. They come with a flat-screen TV and free WiFi.
The Grand Place restaurant serves traditional cuisine, and in summer guests can enjoy light meals on the hotel’s rooftop bar-terrace.
Please note that the rooftop bar-terrace may be closed to the public at certain times due to private events.
Girona Metro Station is 656 feet away while the stylish Paseo de Gracia is just 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel, with many shops, bars and restaurants.

Catalonia Roma is 1969 feet from Sants AVE Train and Metro Station. It offers free Wi-Fi, and you can reach Barcelona city center in 10 minutes by Metro or bus.
There are direct train links to Barcelona Airport from Sants Station and the Airport Bus also stops outside it.
The modern, air-conditioned rooms have wooden floors, a mini fridge with complimentary water and satellite TV. There is a safe and mini-bar, and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.
A buffet breakfast is served at the hotel restaurant. Room service is available and there is also a bar.
Plaza Espanya, Montjuic’s Magic Fountain and the Fira Conference Center are all within 15 minutes’ walk of the hotel.
The 24-hour front desk at Catalonia Roma features a large stained-glass skylight. You can rent a car and currency exchange is offered.
Pets: Only one dog or cat less than 20 kg is allowed per room (on request). Supplement of 22€ night/animal and deposit of 200€.

column4: Axel Hotel Barcelona & Urban Spa- Adults Only
column17: Axel Hotel Barcelona & Urban Spa- Adults Only
column18:
The area around the Hotel Axel Barcelona is known as the Gay-xample because of its lively gay scene. The staff has knowledge of the local gay scene, and the hotel is hetero-friendly too.
Offering free Wi-Fi throughout, this design hotel is close to Passeig de Gràcia's exclusive boutiques. The Axel Hotel’s 1640 ft² Spa Center includes a hydromassage pool and saunas, and the modern rooms have flat-screen satellite TVs.
The Axel’s Sky Bar features a large swimming pool, a terrace with a hot tub and a cocktail bar. Here you will find parties, art exhibitions and shows.
The Axel Hotel Barcelona & Urban Spa offers easy access to the Ramblas, the Picasso Museum and Gothic Quarter. The hotel occupies an attractive 19th-century building.

column10: Double or Twin Room with Private Bathroom
column18:
This modern hotel offers free wired internet access and colorful rooms with flat-screen satellite TV. The beautiful Laberint d’Horta Park is around a 15-minute walk away.
Colors is located in a quiet residential area, just 1148 feet from Valldaura Metro Station. Direct trains connect to Barcelona city center in around 15 minutes. Free parking can also be found nearby.
Colors is located next to Can Cortada, one of Barcelona’s most popular restaurants. The hotel also has a coffee bar, where you can enjoy a breakfast buffet and light meals.
Rooms at the hotel offer a functional design and simple, stylish décor. Each room is air-conditioned and includes a safe.

Catalonia Magdalenes Hotel is set in  Barcelona, 656 feet from the Cathedral of Barcelona and offers a terrace with an outdoor pool with views of the Cathedral and a spa. Portal de l'Angel is 656 feet away.
Each room at this hotel is air conditioned, soundproofed and features a flat-screen TV and a Nespresso Coffee Machine. The bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.
You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property, There is also a spa with a hot tub and a gym. The hotel offers show-cooking during breakfast.
Plaça Catalunya is 1312 feet from Catalonia Magdalenes Hotel, while Picasso Museum is 1969 feet away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 8.1 mi from the property.

Located in Barcelona, 0.9 mi from Palau Sant Jordi, Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira features air-conditioned accommodations and a bar. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and an outdoor pool. Camp Nou is 1.8 mi away and Boqueria Market is 2.5 mi from the hotel.
At Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.
Guests at the accommodations can enjoy a buffet breakfast.
Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira offers a terrace.
Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.2 mi from the hotel, while Montjuïc is 1.3 mi from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 5 mi from Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira.

ITC Barcelona By Soho Boutique is set in an impressive historic building, next to Barcelona’s Universitat Metro Station. It offers free Wi-Fi and bright, air-conditioned rooms, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and La Rambla.
Rooms feature wooden floors and have a safe and mini-bar. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer.
ITC Barcelona By Soho Boutique offers a buffet breakfast each morning. A gluten-free breakfast is available upon request. Due to its central location, there are many bars and restaurants within a short walk.
ITC Barcelona By Soho Boutique has a 24-hour front desk, and a public parking is available nearby for an additional charge. The Airport Bus stops opposite in Plaza Universitat.

column10: Standard Double or Twin Room with Balcony
column18:
Hotel Medicis is 5 minutes’ walk from Sant Pau Metro Station, allowing you to reach central Barcelona in around 10 minutes. There is Wi-Fi access and a rooftop sun terrace.
The Medicis Hotel is chic and functional, and offers reasonably priced accommodations in a good location. All air-conditioned rooms have satellite TV and a safe. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer.
Just next to the hotel is one of Barcelona’s emblematic Art Nouveau buildings, the Sant Pau Hospital, designed by Domènech i Montaner. From here it is a 10-minute walk down Avinguda de Gaudí to The Sagrada Família. You can stop for a coffee, or a meal, in one of the many café-restaurants that line this avenue.
The hotel has a tour desk, and you can hire a bicycle or car. There is a 24-hour front desk.

Catalonia Castellnou offers free Wi-Fi, a 24-hour reception and bright, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. It is located 820 feet from Tres Torres Underground Station, in a quiet residential area.
There are many cafés, bars and restaurants within a 10-minute walk, in the center of Sarrià.
Hotel Catalonia Castellnou is close to some of Barcelona’s most important medical centers, including Clínica IVI, Clínica Corachan and Fertilab.
The Castellnou offers easy access to the C32 Ring Road and Vallvidrera Tunnel. It is within a 15-minute train journey of central Barcelona, and less than 1.2 mi from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium.Diagonal Avenue, with El Corte Ingles Department Store and two shopping centers, is a 10-minute walk away. Real Club de Tenis Barcelona is 15-minute walk away.

Located between the Gothic Quarter and the fashionable Born district, this stylish hotel has a fitness center and free WiFi in all areas.
Barcelona Cathedral is just 656 feet from the Ilunion Almirante, and guests can walk to the famous Las Ramblas in less than 10 minutes. Jaume I Metro Station is 984 feet from the hotel.
Rooms feature wooden furniture and an private bathroom with marble finishes. They all include a large flat-screen TV with satellite channels, safe and mini-bar.
This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment.
The Ilunion Almirante features a stylish breakfast room where an à-la-carte breakfast is served daily. Room service is available during limited hours.
This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

Occidental Barcelona 1929 features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, fitness center, a terrace and bar in Barcelona. Each room at the 3-star hotel has city views and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking throughout and is located a 7-minute walk from Magic Fountain of Montjuic.
The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a closet, an electric tea pot, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Occidental Barcelona 1929 all rooms have bed linen and towels.
A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation.
Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help.
Sants Railway Station is a 11-minute walk from Occidental Barcelona 1929, while Passeig de Gracia is 1.5 miles away. The nearest airport is Barcelona-El Prat Airport, 6.2 miles from the hotel.

Aparthotel Napols is centrally located, 1148 feet from Barcelona’s Arc de Triomf Metro Station. Air-conditioned rooms feature a well-equipped kitchen, and a living room with sofa and TV.
Estació de Nord Bus Station is 5 minutes’ walk away, and has direct connections to Girona Airport. You can walk to Plaza Catalunya and the Rambla in 15 minutes. There is free WiFi in the apartments.
Soundproofed rooms at the Napols have a safe and mini-bar. The private bathroom comes with amenities.
The modern kitchen has a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. There is a dishwasher and dining area.
The complex has a 24-hour reception and a shared terrace. You can hire a car, and Napols offers a laundry service and luggage storage.

This modern hotel is located on the northern edge of the city of Barcelona, near Avinguda Diagonal and Barcelona FC's famous stadium, Camp Nou. Guests have free access to the seasonal outdoor pool, the gym, and the wellness area that is equipped with sauna, hot tub and Turkish bath. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.
The exterior facing rooms feature a flat-screen TV, mini-bar, and a safe. The bathroom comes with free toiletries, bath, and hairdryer.
Stroll around the gardens of the Abba Garden Hotel. There is also a paddle court, so you can play a quick game.
Grab a bite to eat in the snack bar in the evening - complete with terrace.
Zona Universitaria Metro Station that takes you to the Barcelona city center is a 10-minute walk away. Metro Line 9 is a 13-minute walk away and it takes you to the airport within 15 minutes and to La Fira within 30 minutes.
