Offering air-conditioned rooms in the Horta-Guinardó district of Barcelona, BcnStop Sagrada Familia is a 12-minute walk from Sagrada Familia. There's a private entrance at the condo hotel for the convenience of those who stay. The condo hotel offers a sun terrace, a 24-hour front desk, and free Wifi is available throughout the property.
The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge, and stovetop are also featured, as well as a coffee machine. At the condo hotel, the units come with bed linen and towels.
Sightseeing tours are available in the surrounding area. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the condo hotel.
La Pedrera is 1.7 miles from BcnStop Sagrada Familia, while Casa Batllo is 2.1 miles away. The nearest airport is Barcelona-El Prat, 10 miles from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

This design hotel is in Barcelona’s trendy Born district, 820 feet from the Picasso Museum. It features a gym, 24-hour reception, and air-conditioned rooms with colorful LED lighting and flat-screen TVs.
Free coffee, tea and water are offered in a self-service area in the Chic & Basic Born. The hotel also has a lounge with free Wi-Fi and comfortable designer armchairs.
The Modernist-style building has high ceilings, large windows and marble staircases. It is within 328 feet of Ciudadela Park and Barcelona’s Chocolate Museum. La Rambla is a 10-minute walk away.
Rooms at the Chic & Basic Born Boutique Hotel feature a glass shower cubicle in the center of the room. There is also a hairdryer, slippers and bathroom amenities.
Breakfast is served in the Chic & Basic's Moderna bar, where you can also enjoy a cocktail. It is open 7 days a week from 08:00 to 22:00

Hotel Lloret Ramblas is situated on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, just outside Plaza Catalunya Square. It offers a 24-hour front desk and air conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.
Each functional room at the Lloret Ramblas Hotel features a work desk and a private bathroom with amenities. Some rooms also have a private balcony.
Breakfast is served in Hotel Lloret Ramblas’s beautiful lounge-dining room, which dates from the early 20th century. The lobby area has a free PC with internet and a free safe.
Barcelona Cathedral and the MACBA Modern Art Museum are both around 1640 ft from Hotel Lloret. Catalunya Metro Station is a one-minute walk away, and direct airport buses stop within 330 ft.

Hotel Concordia Barcelona is located 2625 feet from Plaza España and the Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Center. It features a sun terrace with an outdoor swimming pool, hot tub, cocktail bar and solarium.
The Hotel Concordia Barcelona’s bright, spacious rooms feature contemporary décor and air conditioning.  Each room includes free WiFi, a flat-screen TV, safe, mini-bar and a private bathroom with a range of amenities.
The Concordia Barcelona’s modern, elegant  Bistro Triple Sec Restaurant serves characteristic Mediterranean cuisine. The varied breakfast buffet includes healthy options. There is also a café and cocktail bar open daily. Private parking is available on site for an extra cost and electrical cars charging station is available.
Located next to Poble Sec Station, the hotel is a 5-minute Metro journey from Barcelona Port and La Rambla. You can also walk to the Rambla in 15 minutes. Direct airport busses stop in Plaza España, a 15-minute walk away.
Private parking is available on site for an extra cost.

These stylish apartments and rooms are located in the chic Eixample district of central Barcelona, just 1148 feet from the famous Passeig de Gracia Boulevard and Metro Station. They offer a plasma TV and free Wi-Fi.
The air-conditioned Weflating City Center are spacious, bright and offer two or three bedrooms. The modern kitchen includes a washing machine, oven and a dishwasher.
There are several bars, restaurants and shops within 5 minutes- walk of the apartments, and many of the city’s most popular monuments can be reached easily by foot.
Gaudi’s La Pedrera and La Rambla are both just 10 minutes’ walk away. The Barceloneta area with its beach can be reached by metro in around 10 minutes.
Direct busses to El Prat Airport run from outside El Corte Ingles department store on Plaza Catalunya Square, 1969 feet away. Various busses, trains and metros also run from here.

column4: Claris Hotel & Spa GL, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World
column10: Superior Double or Twin Room (1-2 Adults)
column17: Claris Hotel & Spa GL, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World
column18:
Located just off Barcelona’s prestigious Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, this luxury hotel offers city views from its rooftop pool. It also has a unique art collection.
Built in a converted 19th century palace, Claris Hotel & Spa GL combines the classicism of the original place with modern materials and it has over 400 original pieces of art on display, giving it the Specialit Monument status. It offers free entry to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum, located next door.
The smart, soundproofed bedrooms feature stylish décor and hand-made furniture. Each one comes with LCD satellite TV, sofa and pieces of Roman, Egyptian and Hindu artwork.
The hotel’s Terraza del Claris Restaurant serves gourmet Mediterranean food on the roof terrace overlooking the characteristic rooftops of the Eixample quarter. The Os-kuro Sushi & Robata Restaurant offers classic recipes from Japanese gastronomy combined with Mediterranean ingredients and local produce.
All TV in rooms feature ChromeCast offering connectivity to platforms such as Netflix, Amazon Prime, Youtube, etc.
The Claris is just 5 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera. The Ramblas is around 10 minutes’ walk away.

Set in Barcelona, 1.3 mi from Somorrostro Beach, Hotel Omnium offers accommodations with a shared lounge, private parking and a terrace. Among the facilities at this property are a concierge service and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property.
The units at the hotel feature air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel Omnium every room has bed linen and towels.
Popular points of interest near the hotel include Tivoli Theater, Cathedral of Barcelona and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 8.1 mi from Hotel Omnium.

This modern hotel has 250 spacious and fully equipped rooms, a Snack-Bar open 24 hours where clients can enjoy a buffet breakfast, as well as light meals for lunch and dinner. It also has vending machines and private paid parking. All its facilities are perfectly adapted and accessible for people with reduced mobility.
It is a hotel with free and unlimited high-speed Wi-Fi in the common areas. Wi-Fi internet is available in the rooms at an extra cost.
Travelodge Barcelona Poblenou is a pet-friendly hotel that will be happy to offer you and your pet the best experience.
It is located in the traditional Poblenou neighborhood, within streets full of restaurants, bars and shops. One of the most charming neighborhoods in the city, and 1969 feet from the Bogatell beach. Barcelona city center can be reached in 10 minutes by metro and Barcelona’s Port Olímpic, with its vibrant night life, is just a 20-minute walk away.
This is considered the most innovative neighborhood in the city. It´s in the heart of the 22@ District and concentrates a multitude of technology and R+D companies. Therefore, thanks to its location and facilities, it is also a perfect accommodations for business trips.
Travelodge Barcelona Poblenou offers all you need to have the best experience in Barcelona city.

Set just off Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, 3 minutes’ walk from central Plaza Catalunya, Catalonia Ramblas 4* Sup  features a seasonal outdoor pool with a south-facing terrace, a poolside snack bar and a chill-out area.
Housed in a modernist building, all bright and spacious rooms come with a flat-screen satellite smart TV equipped with Chromecast App, free WiFi and tea and coffee facilities. Some have a private terrace with a private pool. Room service is available.
The spa at Catalonia Ramblas 4* Sup features a relaxation area. It includes a sauna, a steam bath and a hot tub. Massage and beauty treatments are also available.
The hotel’s restaurant, Pelai Restaurant, offers Catalan market cuisine. Dishes cooked on a coal stove are available at the Pelai terrace, a rooftop terrace with a chill-out area with panoramic city views. A buffet breakfast is offered every morning and, on weekends, it is available until 11:00.
In the summer months, the terrace is open until 00:00 and has a summer menu, as well as cocktails and milkshakes.

Situated next to Gràcia FGC Train Station, Hotel Via Augusta has a rooftop terrace with views of Barcelona. It offers functional, air conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.
The Via Augusta is a historic building with a beautiful original foyer. Rooms have simple, modern décor and hardwood floors. They include a work desk, a safe and a bathroom with a hairdryer.
A varied breakfast buffet is served in the hotel, and drinks are available from the vending machine. A wide range of bars and restaurants can be found in the popular Gràcia district, within a 5-minute walk.
Hotel Via Augusta is 1300 ft from Fontana Metro Station, and Parc Güell is just 1 Metro stop away. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are a 5-minute ride from nearby Gracia Station.

Housed in a traditional 19th-century building, this hotel is located between Plaza de Catalunya and Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter. It offers free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool surrounded by painted murals.
The Catalonia Portal de l'Angel maintains much of its original design. It features comfortable rooms with air conditioning, satellite TV and coffee and tea facilities. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.
A buffet breakfast is served daily from 07:30 to 11:00 at Catalonia Portal de l'Angel.
The famous Las Ramblas is less than 656 feet away, while Barcelona Cathedral is 328 feet from the hotel. The Portal de l'Angel is just a 5-minute walk from Catalunya Metro and Railway Station.

Located just off Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia, Gallery Hotel offers a free sauna and gym, and a seasonal rooftop terrace with a pool and city views. Rooms include free Wi-Fi and free water on arrival.
This elegant hotel offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV. The modern bathrooms include amenities, a hairdryer and a bathrobe.
The Gallery’s restaurant has an attractive garden terrace where you can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine. The hotel also has a bar and a café.
Gallery Hotel is located next to the gardens of Palau Robert, a gallery and tourist information center. Gaudí’s La Pedrera is a 3-minute walk away, while nearby Diagonal Metro Station provides direct access to the Sagrada Familia. Regular airport trains stop 1969 feet away at Passeig de Gracia Station.

Barcelona House Hotel is in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, 260 ft from the Ramblas. The hotel has modern, air-conditioned rooms with hardwood floors, free wired internet and a flat-screen TV.
Barcelona Cathedral and the Boquería Market are just over a quarter mile away. The port and Maremagnum Shopping Center are a 10-minute walk from the hotel. You can walk to Barceloneta Beach in 20 minutes or take a bus.
Rooms are also heated and have a safe. The private bathrooms include a hairdryer.
There are many bars, restaurants and galleries near the Barcelona House. The Picasso Museum and fashionable Borne district are a 10-minute walk away.
There is a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage is available.

Conveniently set in Barcelona, Hotel Raval House provides air-conditioned rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a garden. 1.6 miles from Sant Sebastian Beach and 1.6 miles from Sant Miquel Beach, the property has a terrace and a bar. The property is non-smoking throughout and is located 1.7 miles from Barceloneta Beach.
All guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, certain units at Hotel Raval House also provide guests with a city view. All rooms include a closet.
Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock.
Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Boqueria Market, Passeig de Gracia and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona-El Prat Airport, 7.5 miles from Hotel Raval House.

SM Hotel Teatre Auditori is across from the Catalan National Theatre, close to Glòries and Monumental Metro Stations. This stylish hotel features rooms with satellite TV.
The Auditori has bright, attractive décor. Each air-conditioned room has a desk and a safe.
Breakfast is served in the hotel café.
The staff at the 24-hour front desk can provide information on Barcelona’s attractions, as well as arrange bike and car rental.
Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia is just a 15-minute walk from the hotel, and Glòries Metro is just 4 stops from Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas.

SmartRoom Barcelona is an eco-friendly economy hotel located in central Barcelona, 0.6 mi from Sants Train Station. Decorated in a modern style, each room here will provide you with a flat-screen Smart TV with satellite channels. This hotel has been awarded the Green Key for their sustainable and environmental friendly business.
The air-conditioned rooms have free WiFi access. Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with free toiletries. Extras include a desk and bed linen.
A buffet breakfast is available daily. Other facilities offered at the property include a vending machine with drinks and snacks. At SmartRoom Barcelona you will find a 24-hour front desk.
Plaza de Sants is 1476 feet from SmartRoom Barcelona and Sants Train Station is 15 minutes' walk away. The hotel is 0.9 mi from Camp Nou and Magic Fountain of Montjuïc. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 20 minutes' drive away.

Located 5 minutes’ walk from Les Corts Metro Station, this hotel offers modern accommodations in Barcelona. It has good access to the city's main attractions, such as the Nou Camp Football Stadium.
The air-conditioned rooms at the NH Barcelona Les Corts feature contemporary décor, free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a private balcony or terrace. The private bathroom has a hairdryer and toiletries.
The hotel operates a tour desk and a 24-hour reception. Helpful staff can organize bicycle and car rental, as well as provide information on Barcelona.
NH Les Corts is less than 10 minutes’ walk from Sants Train Station, providing access to Barcelona Airport. L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Center is just 984 feet away. Barcelona Airport is 9.3 mi from the property.

There is a gym and a rooftop chill-out terrace with a swimming pool and wonderful city views. It is located 328 feet from Barcelona Cathedral, in the historic Gothic Quarter.
Each elegant room at the Barcelona Catedral Hotel features wooden flooring and air conditioning. Rooms have free WiFi, a laptop safe and flat-screen TV with international channels. Smoking is not allowed in any of the rooms, but there are common areas where smoking is allowed.
Creative Mediterranean cuisine is served in the hotel’s 4 Capellans restaurant, which offers a menu for celiacs. There is a wide range of restaurants and tapas bars within a 5-minute walk, including many in the popular El Born district.
Hotel Barcelona Catedral is 1476 feet from Plaza Catalunya Square, while Las Ramblas are a 5-minute walk away.

Aparthotel Augusta offers well-priced accommodations with free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour front desk. It is set in Barcelona’s Sant Gervasi district and just 330 ft from Plaza Molina FGC Train station.
Rooms at the Aparthotel Augusta are simple and comfortable. They have a kitchenette with an oven, stove and a fridge. There is also a living area with a TV.
There are stores and supermarkets nearby. The Libertad Market also sells fresh, local food and is just 1700 ft from the hotel.
The popular Gràcia district, which features a range of cafés, bars and restaurants, is just a 10 minute walk away.
Plaza de Catalunya can be reached in less than 15 minutes from Plaza Molina FGC Station, or from Fontana Metro, which is approximately 1000 ft from the Augusta.

column4: Holiday Inn Express Barcelona City 22@, an IHG Hotel
column17: Holiday Inn Express Barcelona City 22@, an IHG Hotel
column18:
Holiday Inn Express Barcelona City 22@ is located in the city’s 22@ District, 984 feet from Llacuna Metro Station. This hotel features rooms with satellite TV and a continental buffet breakfast included in all rates.
The Barcelona City offers simple, contemporary décor throughout. Rooms are spacious and air conditioned.Some amenities and high touch items such as kettles, pens, note pads, etc have been removed from guest rooms as per Covid-19 hygienic and security regulations. In any case, all of these items are still available upon request.
The hotel offer free WiFi access to the guests. There is also a computer and printer for their use.
The City 22@ is ideally located for visiting many of Barcelona’s attractions and the beach is less than one mile away. Plaza de Catalunya and the famous Las Ramblas can be reached in less than 20 minutes, by Metro.

Just a 5-minute walk from the Sagrada Familia, this stylish, modern hotel features a 24-hour front desk and free Wi-Fi access is available throughout. Monumental Metro Station is 215 yards away.
The rooms at SM Hotel Sant Antoni feature parquet floors, a safe, work desk and flat-screen TV. Decorated in white, black and red tones, they have air conditioning and heating, and the private bathroom includes a hairdryer and toiletries.
The Sant Antoni serves a continental buffet breakfast, and drinks and snacks are available from the vending machines. A wide range of cafes and restaurants can be found within a 5-minute walk.
SM Hotel Sant Antoni is half a mile from L’Auditori Concert Hall and the National Theatre. Glòries Shopping Center and Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard can both be reached within a 20-minute walk. You can reach Plaza Catalunya in 10 minutes by bus or metro.

Located in Barcelona, 2953 feet from Port Olympic, ibis Styles Barcelona City Bogatell features private parking and free WiFi access. The hotel has an outdoor pool and children's playground, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar.
A TV is available.
You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.
You can play table tennis at the hotel. The hotel also offers bike hire. Picasso Museum is 0.9 mi from ibis Styles Barcelona City Bogatell, while La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 1.1 mi from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 9.3 mi from ibis Styles Barcelona City Bogatell.

Hotel Turin Barcelona is located just 164 feet from the famous Ramblas in Barcelona. It offers free Wi-Fi, 24-hour reception, free luggage storage and a lovely sun terrace. There is free water, coffee and tea in the lobby lounge.
It features stylish rooms with wooden floors and furnishings. They are equipped with a private bathroom, hairdryer, safe, Smart TV and mini-bar.
The Turin Hotel is located just 492 feet from the Gothic District, 3 minutes from the Liceu metro and a 20-minute walk from the beach. In the area there are several restaurants, shops and supermarkets open until late.
The hotel offers a fabulous breakfast buffet. Most of the food items come from La Boquería Market, located 2 minutes' walk away.

Acta CITY47 is 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Sants Train Station and 15 minutes from the Fira Exhibition Center. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi.
The rooms at Acta CITY47 feature simple, modern décor and a private bathroom. Each one comes with a TV, free safe, and a work desk. Guests have free access to an ironing room open 24 hours.
The hotel’s modern Nass City restaurant serves international food and a gluten-free breakfast is available on prior request. There is also a bar where you can get a snack or a drink.
The Acta CITY47 is 20 minutes’ walk from Barcelona FC’s Camp Nou Stadium. Sants Metro Station connects you with the center of Barcelona in 15 minutes.

Set beside Barcelona's Francesc Macià Square, Vincci Mae features a terrace with a plunge pool and fantastic views of Diagonal Avenue and Tibidabo Mountain.
Vincci Mae features an on-site restaurant and bar, it also has a 24-hour front desk and offers free WiFi throughout the property.  An assorted buffet breakfast is offered everyday.
Stylish rooms feature a simple and bright décor, air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV, kettle, and mini-bar. The fancy private bathroom includes a shower, free toiletries ,and a hairdryer.
Casa Batlló is 1 mi from Vincci Mae, while La Pedrera is 0.8 mi away. You can reach Plaza Catalunya in 20 minutes in public transport.

This modern hotel offers spacious, air-conditioned suites with a separate seating area, private balcony, free WiFi and 2 TVs. The hotel is 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard.
There are several restaurants within a 5-minute walk from Guitard Grand Passage. Also, the hotel is only 1640 feet from Hospital Clinic Metro Station.
There are good transport connections to Barcelona El Prat Airport from Passeig de Gràcia Metro Station, located around 15 minutes’ walk away.

Located right opposite Barcelona Cathedral, this grand, neoclassic hotel is a 5-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya. It offers free WiFi, and some rooms have excellent views of the cathedral façade.
The stylish air-conditioned rooms at the Colón Hotel Barcelona have satellite TV and a mini-bar. There is a safe and work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a bathrobe, slippers and hairdryer. Superior rooms also have a Nespresso coffee machine.
The hotel features an outdoor terrace café in the square, facing the cathedral. The hotel’s elegant restaurant serves Catalan cuisine and international dishes, and room service is available.
Guests can also enjoy the roof-top terrace with views of the cathedral
There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Parking is available nearby for an additional charge.

column10: Double or Twin Room with Kitchen - Ground Floor
column18:
The Aparthotel Senator Barcelona is on Via Augusta, in a pleasant residential area, a 2-minute walk from Muntaner Train Station. It includes air conditioning, heating, and free Wi-Fi in hotel rooms.
All rooms and apartments have a TV, telephone, and a private bathroom with a bathtub or a shower. The apartments also include an equipped with kitchenette.
A 6-minute train ride will take you to Plaza Cataluña and central Barcelona. Sagrada Familia Cathedral is 2 miles away.

Royal Ramblas is located on Barcelona's famous Ramblas, 328 feet from Plaza de Catalunya. It offers elegant and modern rooms with air conditioning, plasma TV, free Wi-Fi, and private parking. Some  rooms provide magnificent views of the Ramblas.
The Hotel has a meeting room with magnificent views of the Ramblas.
It offers a buffet breakfast with various regional products and homemade pastries in the La Poma restaurant with impressive views of Las Ramblas where you can also taste Mediterranean food.
The Royal Ramblas Hotel is ideally located with access to all public transport and a 5-minute walk from the elegant Passeig de Gràcia, where you will find numerous restaurants and exclusive shops. The old town is within walking distance, as well as the Mercat de la Boqueria and the MACBA. The beach is 20 minutes away.
The Royal Ramblas Barcelona's tour desk offers useful information about the city and car rental services. It also manages the airport transfer service.

Get the celebrity treatment with world-class service at Hotel Casa Fuster G.L Monumento
This iconic, Modernist building is located at the head of Barcelona’s chic Passeig de Gracia Avenue. It has a sauna and gym, and a roof terrace with a pool and excellent views.
The luxurious Casa Fuster is a monument in itself, built in 1908 by the Modernist architect, Lluis Domènech i Montaner, and has the status of Specialty Monument. His work, including the hotel, is a designated UNESCO World Heritage Site.
The elegant air-conditioned rooms at Casa Fuster G.L Monumento feature satellite TV and a mini-bar. There is a private bathroom with a hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. Some rooms have a hydro-massage bath.
The Casa Fuster Hotel has a stylish restaurant, which serves Mediterranean cuisine. Room service is available, and there is a jazz bar and rooftop chill-out bar.
There is a concierge service and 24-hour front desk. You can hire a car from the tour desk, and parking is available nearby for an additional charge.

column4: AC Hotel Victoria Suites by Marriott
column17: AC Hotel Victoria Suites by Marriott
column18:
Beautiful and stylish suites located in the heart of Pedralbes, one of the top residential areas of Barcelona and close to one of the city's main business districts.
AC Hotel Victoria Suites is ideal for business travelers due its location, for weekend breaks due its tranquil environment and excellent gastronomy offer as well for families due the spaciousness of the rooms.
It features a large terrace-bar, a high quality restaurant, friendly staff and many other details.

The modern Hotel Grums is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes' walk from Barcelona’s port, ferry terminal and cruise terminal. The Ramblas are 1969 feet away, and Parallel Metro Station 984 feet away.
Hotel Grums Barcelona offers elegant, bright and spacious rooms with themed design décor and panoramic floor-to-ceiling windows. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout.
All our rooms have free RITUALS Cosmetics amenities.
The Hotel Grums Barcelona features a wellness spa which is not included in the room rate and can be accessed for a small surcharge. Guests can relax in the hot tub, Finnish sauna or steam bath. A selection of massage and treatments are also available at an extra cost.

Ronda House is set just off Ronda Sant Antoni Avenue, 10 minutes’ walk from Las Ramblas. This hotel has a restaurant and rooms with satellite TV.
The Ronda features bright, simple décor. Its air-conditioned rooms have fully equipped private bathrooms.
A daily buffet breakfast is served in the Ronda’s café which includes a variety of coffees and pastries. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant and the bar.
The MACBA Art Gallery is just 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Sant Antoni Metro Station is 656 feet from the hotel and connects guests to sights such as Gaudí’s Sagrada Familía and Casa Batlló in less than 15 minutes.

Just 1148 feet from Mar Bella Beach, Eurohotel Diagonal Port offers Mediterranean Sea views from its setting in Barcelona’s Poble Nou district.
Rooms at this hotel are spacious and feature contemporary design. All come with air conditioning, satellite TV. Free wired internet access is also available.
Facilities at Eurohotel Diagonal Port include a continental breakfast.
Eurohotel Diagonal Port is located 7 minutes’ walk from Poblenou Metro Station, which is just 5 stops from central Barcelona. The hotel is just over 1.2 mi from Ciutadella Park and the Forum venue is a 20-minute walk away.
The hotel offers easy access to the 22@ financial district, close to Barcelona International Convention Center and shops. There is a Metro station and busses stop within 5 minutes' walk of the hotel.

Stay in the refined elegance of the classic Hotel Continental Palacete, set in a renovated, 19th-century palace. Located right in the heart of Barcelona it is just 1148 feet from Plaza Catalunya.
Guests have access to a free, 24-hour continental buffet with a variety of food and drinks.
Continental Palacete features luxurious, Baroque decor, with priceless chandeliers and elaborate frescoes.
Modern, air-conditioned rooms have free high-speed WiFi access, satellite TV, a fridge and a microwave. Their private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.
The hotel lies on the elegant Rambla de Catalunya, just a 5-minute walk from the city’s main square of Plaça Catalunya. The surrounding streets are full of Barcelona’s distinctive architecture, smart restaurants and exclusive boutiques.

Set on Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue, the Hesperia Barcelona Presidente offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs. There is a gym and a terrace offering city views.
This hotel has views of the city.
The Hesperia Barcelona Presidente is close to a shopping area, and the main sightseeing bus stops just 164 feet from the hotel. The popular Illa shopping center is 15 minutes’ walk away.
Diagonal Metro Station is 10 minutes’ walk away, and offers a direct link to Plaza Catalunya. Gaudi’s La Pedrera and fashionable Passeig de Gracia can be reached in about 15 minutes on foot.

Attractively set in the Horta-Guinardó district of Barcelona, Ilunion Bel-Art is located a 12-minute walk from Sagrada Familia, 1.7 miles from La Pedrera and 1.1 miles from Park Güell. With a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Private parking is available on site.
The rooms at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. At Ilunion Bel-Art rooms include bed linen and towels.
A buffet, vegetarian or vegan breakfast is served at the property.
Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay.
Casa Batllo is 2 miles from the accommodation, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.3 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona-El Prat Airport, 10 miles from Ilunion Bel-Art.

Hotel Cram Hotel is set in Barcelona’s central Eixample district, a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya. It features a rooftop pool with city views and the Two Michelin Stars Angle Barcelona restaurant. All rooms have free WiFi and large flat-screen TVs.
The Cram Hotel Hotel is located in a building that dates back to 1892 and features a modernist façade, and a modern, elegant interior. Rooms boast advanced lighting and access control technology.
The air-conditioned rooms at Cram Hotel Hotel feature a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A bathrobe and slippers are available upon request. Rooms feature beds by Treca de Paris, and elegant curtains by Gastón y Daniela. Some rooms have a private balcony.
The Two Michelin Stars Restaurante Angle Barcelona offers modern dishes using fresh produce. Hotel Cram Hotel Barcelona also has a cocktail bar and poolside bar, and room service is available.
The hotel has a tour desk and 24-hour front desk. You can hire a bicycle or car.

This elegant hotel is 820 feet from Paseo de Gracia Metro Station and Boulevard. Plaza Catalunya is a 5-minute walk away. It offers free Wi-Fi.
Set in an attractive building, dating from 1888, rooms at the Acta Atrium Palace are modern and chic, with air conditioning and satellite TV. The private bathrooms offer free toiletries and a bathrobe.
The hotel has 24-hour room service.
Gaudí's famous Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are 10 minutes' walk away. There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car at the hotel tour desk. Public parking is available nearby.

Ilunion Les Corts Spa features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, fitness center, a terrace and bar in Barcelona. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodations provides a concierge service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests.
The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a mini-bar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Ilunion Les Corts Spa every room comes with bed linen and towels.
A gluten-free breakfast is available daily at the accommodations.
Camp Nou is less than 0.6 mi from Ilunion Les Corts Spa, while Sants Railway Station is 2.2 mi away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 6.8 mi from the hotel.
The hotel is a 15-minute drive from Plaza España, from where the shuttles leave to the Montjuic field.

This elegant hotel is located in the exclusive Sarrià area and has a garden terrace with an outdoor pool and hot tub. It offers functional, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV, a mini fridge with complimentary water and free Wi-Fi.
The Catalonia Mikado's restaurant serves breakfast and evening meals, specializing in international dishes. There is also a bar. Only 1640 feet away, the charming center of Sarrià is famous for its cake shops.
The Catalonia Mikado is within a 10-minute walk of Ramon Llull University and the International University of Catalonia. It is also well located for some of Barcelona's most important medical centers, including the Teknon Center and IMO and the Institut Catalá de la Retina.
Sarrià Train Station is just 10 minutes’ walk away. From here you can get to central Barcelona in 5 minutes.

Featuring a seasonal rooftop plunge pool with views and a solarium, Room Mate Anna is set in Barcelona City Center. The hotel features cutting-edge and modern design as well as personalized service. The hotel serves a daily hot and cold buffet breakfast until midday.
Each stylish, air-conditioned room comes with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day as well as a balcony with views over Casa Batlló. Extras include a wide variety of free toiletries, a hairdryer and safe box.
Other facilities include a portable WiFi and meeting and conference rooms.
On the eigth floor of the hotel the bar Terraza de Anna by Vida Mona offers views over the city, cocktails and mediterranean tapas.
 The restaurant Vibra Speakeasy, inspired by the style of 1920, offers live music, food and cocktails from that time.
The Room Mate Anna is set in the heart of L'Eixample, just 328 feet from Casa Batlló. You will find a wide range of shops, restaurants, and cultural spots. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 8.1 mi from the property.

The Atiram Oriente is located on Las Ramblas, between the Liceu Theater and the Columbus Monument. Set in a 19th-century building, this hotel features a restaurant, terrace and free Wi-Fi.
All rooms have satellite TV and an private bathroom with a hairdryer. Each has simple, contemporary décor with heating and air conditioning.
The hotel’s pretty restaurant serves buffet cuisine and a daily continental breakfast. There is a 24-hour reception and a tour desk. The Atiram Oriente Barcelona also has a café on the Ramblas, close to many shops and restaurants.
The famous Boquería Market and Gothic Quarter are just a few minutes’ walk from the Hotel Atiram Oriente. Barcelona’s Port Vell is less than 1640 feet away and Liceu Metro Station is 1 minute walk from the hotel.

The AC Hotel Irla is located 656 feet from Diagonal and Francesc Macià Square. The hotel has stylish and comfortable rooms, a fitness center and 24-hour reception.
Rooms at this hotel are spacious and feature contemporary décor. All rooms have air conditioning, mini-bar and private bathroom.
Facilities at the Irla include Turkish baths, café-bar and free Wi-Fi access in public areas.
Guests can enjoy breakfast in the Irla’s restaurant. There are also bars, cafes and restaurants in the area surrounding Francesc Macià.
Attractions such as Casa Batlló, Casa Mila and Plaça de Catalunya are within 30 minutes’ walk of the AC Hotel Irla. The hotel is close to bus and tram connections and is a 20-minute walk from the Metro station, Diagonal.

Located just 164 feet from the famous Las Ramblas in Barcelona, Gaudi Hotel features a shared terrace with views of the Palau Güell and the city. Free WiFi is available.
The hotel is 984 feet from Liceu Metro Station. You can visit many of the city’s attractions on foot. The Boqueria Market is 1476 feet from the hotel. The Port and Maremagnum Shopping Center are a 10-minute walk away.
All air-conditioned rooms at the Gaudi Hotel have a private bathroom and a TV. Some have a private balcony and safe. Rooms are modern, with wooden floors, and some offer excellent views of the city or Palau Güell.
A continental breakfast is served in the Gaudi’s restaurant. There is a bar and a snack bar.
There is a 24-hour front desk, and a laundry and ironing service are available. Guests also have free use of the hotel's 2 computers with internet access.

Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Las Ramblas is located in the center of Barcelona’s Old Town, just 656 feet from Las Ramblas. It features a rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool.
The hotel offers simple, attractive décor and rooms are spacious. Each has air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, as well as tea and coffee making facilities.
The Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Las Ramblas serves a daily, buffet breakfast. There are several bars, cafés and restaurants within walking distance of the property.
Guests can make use of computers with internet access, available in the hotel reception area. Staff at the tour desk can provide information on Barcelona’s tourist attractions and arrange car rental.
The hotel is 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Cathedral and the city’s Gothic Quarter. The Old Port is around 2297 feet from the hotel, while Liceu Metro is a 10-minute walk away.

column4: Hotel Bagués, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World
column17: Hotel Bagués, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World
column18:
A rooftop pool and bar with fantastic city views are offered at this 5-star boutique hotel, located on Las Ramblas. Each stylish room displays a unique item of jewelry from the Masriera Museum.
Hotel Bagués is set in the restored El Regulador Palace, once a jewelry workshop, and it is built in a romantic, classical style, which gives it the Specialty Monument status. It still houses the Masriera Jewelry Museum.
Rooms are decorated in deep colors, with ebony furniture and details in gold leaf. An iPod dock, flat-screen satellite TV and free soft drinks mini-bar are included. Many rooms also have views of La Rambla.
Located in the Gothic Quarter, Hotel Bagués is a 5-minute walk from Barcelona Cathedral. Just 984 feet away, Plaza Catalunya Square offers excellent bus and Metro links.
Modern fusion cuisine is served in El Regulador Bistro. This includes creative versions of characteristic Catalan dishes. Room service is available 24 hours a day.

Offering a roof terrace with a swimming pool and bar, Sercotel Amister Art Hotel Barcelona is located just 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s fashionable Paseo de Gracia Boulevard. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel.
Each floor of the hotel is dedicated to a different artist and rooms feature contemporary art work. The stylish rooms come with a flat-screen TV, safe and air conditioning,
Located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Sercotel Amister Art Hotel Barcelona is approximately 1312 feet from Entença and Hospital Clinic Metro Stations. It is also 15 minutes’ walk from Gaudís Casa Batllò, and La Pedrera.
Parking can be arranged at the hotel. Across the hotel there is a bus stop and taxi service.

column10: Standard Double or Twin Room (1-2 Adults)
column18:
Featuring a rootop pool, this boutique hotel is located in Barcelona’s historic center, close to Palau de la Música Concert Hall, the Cathedral and the Ramblas.
Ohla Barcelona features rooms with contemporary décor and large windows. They all include a flat-screen TV and free WiFi. The modern bathrooms come with bathrobes and slippers. Some rooms have views over the historic Gothic Quarter.
Romain Fornell is currently the head chef for all the culinary spaces at hotel Ohla Barcelona: Caelis restaurant, Vistro49, and La Plassohla. This last restaurant is specialized in catalan cuisine, offers tapas and small dishes. Guests can also have a cocktail in the famous Ohla rooftop bar.
The rooftop swimming pool offers fantastic city views with a chill out terrace. Other facilities at this hotel include a gym and a wellness area with a sauna.
The Ohla Barcelona is 984 feet from Plaza Catalunya Square while Urquinaona Metro Station is only 656 feet away. Passeig de Gracia Avenue and Gaudi’s modernist buildings are 10 minutes’ walk of the hotel.

Ideally set in the center of Barcelona, Hotel Casa Sagnier has air-conditioned rooms, a fitness center, free WiFi and a terrace. Offering a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as a sauna. The property provides room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests.
At the hotel, rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Rooms include a safety deposit box, while some rooms have a balcony and others also feature city views. The rooms will provide guests with a closet and an electric tea pot.
The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or continental options.
Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish, staff are willing to help at any time of the day at the reception.
Popular points of interest near Hotel Casa Sagnier include La Pedrera, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona-El Prat, 8.1 miles from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Located in Barcelona, a 16-minute walk from Llevant, The Social Hub Barcelona Poblenou has accommodations with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness center and a garden. Among the facilities at this property are a shared lounge and a business center, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel has a terrace and city views, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar.
Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at the hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms contain a seating area. At The Social Hub Barcelona Poblenou rooms include bed linen and towels.
Speaking Catalan, Czech, English and Spanish, staff are always on hand to help at the reception.
Nova Mar Bella Beach is a 19-minute walk from the accommodation, while Mar Bella Beach is one mile from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona-El Prat Airport, 11 miles from The Social Hub Barcelona Poblenou.

In the heart of Barcelona, Vincci Gala hotel offers luxurious rooms in a protected 19th-century palace. Free Wi-Fi is available.
The orginal façade, floor and central staircase of this unique hotel have all been preserved, creating a balance of traditional arquitecture and modern design.
The air-conditioned rooms include a private bathroom with hairdryer, free toiletries, and bathtub or shower. The rooms also have a free laptop safe, extra large beds, satellite TV with pay-per-view channels, and a minibar.
A restaurant and snack bar are available on-site, and the hotel offers a breakfast buffet. Laundry and car rental services are available for a fee, and the property can provide tourist information.
Vincci Gala hotel is located across from Urquinaona Metro Station, a 2-minute walk from Plaça Catalunya Square.  There are many bars, restaurants and shops in the surroundings, and you can reach Gaudi's La Sagrada Familia in 15 minutes by metro.

Located in Barcelona's Plaza de España, Hotel Catalonia Barcelona Plaza offers a seasonal rooftop pool and a terrace with panoramic city views. It also has a fitness room, beauty salon and free Wi-Fi.
The property is located next to Espanya Metro Station. In the square there are numerous bus stops that connect with other parts of the city, with the Fira Barcelona fairground and with Barcelona airport.
All spacious rooms are equipped with air conditioning, satellite TV, a safe and a private marble bathroom with hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout, and Smart TVs with Chromecast apps are available. Choose one of the two clock suites and you will have incredible views of Montjuïc from the floor-to-ceiling windows. If you prefer, the hotel also has rooms and suites with private terrace.
The Catalonia Barcelona Plaza serves a daily buffet breakfast in the Simultáneo space, Barcelona's new meeting point that fuses cultural and leisure activities with the best gastronomic offer. Come to Simultáneo to telework with free wifi, to have an informal meeting, to enjoy a concert or to have an afterwork cocktail.
Do you already know the  Simultáneo Gastrobar? An avant-garde space that offers unique haute cuisine dishes. If you book half board, you can enjoy the Gastrobar menu during lunch or dinner.
The Filigrana restaurant specializes in modern Catalan cuisine made with local ingredients. You can also visit the Japanese restaurant Kurai or have a drink on The Clock terrace, overlooking Montjuïc.
The Catalonia Barcelona Plaza has a spacious business center with 3 large conference rooms and 8 meeting rooms, all equipped with the latest technology.
This is our guests' favorite part of Barcelona, according to independent reviews.

Located in Barcelona, 1.1 miles from Bogatell, The Hoxton, Poblenou provides accommodations with a restaurant, private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a bar. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The property has a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests.
Guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. Certain rooms include a kitchenette with a minibar. All guest rooms will provide guests with a desk and an electric tea pot.
Guests at The Hoxton, Poblenou can enjoy a à la carte breakfast.
Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Nova Icaria, Mar Bella and Sagrada Familia. The nearest airport is Barcelona-El Prat Airport, 9 miles from The Hoxton, Poblenou.

Featuring a rooftop swimming pool and hot tub with views of Barcelona, Sunotel Central is set in the center of Barcelona, just 10 minutes' walk from Plaza Catalunya.
Modern rooms at Sunotel Central include free high-speed WiFi, satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and amenities.
Universitat Metro Station is just 656 feet from the hotel. The Ramblas, famous for its street performers, can be reached in 10 minutes by foot.
In the morning guests can enjoy a varied, fresh and healthy full buffet breakfast.
The hotel’s 24-hour reception offers a ticket booking service and luggage storage. There are computers in the lobby which guests can use for free. Meeting rooms are also available.

Offering panoramic views from its rooftop terrace, which has a seasonal hot tub and swimming pool, Sunotel Junior is set 984 feet from Francesc Macià Square. It offers free, high-speed WiFi.
All rooms at Sunotel Junior have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, soundproofed windows and a fully equipped bathroom.
Guests can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast each morning. The hotel’s restaurant, Pa'l Caldero, offers a selection of dishes from around the world. There is also a range of cafés and restaurants nearby.
You will find a 24-hour reception that offers a luggage storage service and free pool towels. There are also several meeting rooms available.
The Sunotel is a 5-minute walk from Hospital Clinic Metro Station, and Sants Railway Station is just 2 metro stops away.
FC Barcelona’s famous Camp Nou Stadium can be reached in 15 minutes by public transport, and Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are also around 15 minutes away.

Serhs Carlit Boutique Hotel is located in Barcelona, 2953 feet from the iconic Sagrada Família Basilica and Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms, all with free WiFi and a flat-screen satellite TV.
The Serhs Carlit is a 10-minute walk from Arc de Triomf, with Ciutadella Park and the trendy Born district just beyond. You can walk to the Agbar Tower in 15 minutes.
Tetuan Metro Station is just 656 feet away, just 1 stop away from Passeig de Gràcia. Estació del Nord Bus Station is 2461 feet away.
The hotel has a café-bar serving a daily buffet breakfast, as well as snacks and drinks throughout the day. Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona, as well as offering restaurant recommendations.

Offering a year-round outdoor pool with city views, Ohla Eixample is a stylish boutique hotel located 10 minutes’ walk from two of Gaudi’s major works, La Pedrera and Casa Batlló. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout and a Clef d’Or Concierge service.
Each well-designed room comes with a large bed and a private bathroom with bath or a rainfall shower. There is a 55-inch flat-screen satellite TV, a mini-bar with local delicatessen and a free safe for laptops. A turndown service is also available.
The on-site Michelin-starred Xerta Restaurant serves traditional recipes from the Ebro Region; and a complete breakfast is also served every morning including a huge selection of local products. The hotel also has the Lobby Bar, a meeting point for both locals and hotel guests; and the Sky Bar, a creative cocktail bar.
Guests can enjoy a selection of high-tech fitness equipment at the on-site gym; and beauty treatments and fashion services such as personal shopper are available on prior request.
Ohla Eixample is conveniently located in the Eixample District, in the modernist area locally known as Quadrat d’Or - Golden Square; within 5 minutes’ walk of the emblematic Diagonal Avenue, Rambla de Catalunya and Paseo de Gracia shopping boulevards. This urban building has an eye-catching ceramic façade, made from over 1000 carved pieces that represent Vivaldi’s Four Seasons.

Located on the fashionable Paseo de Gracia, within 5 minutes’ walk from both Gaudi’s masterpieces Casa Battló and La Pedrera, Monument Hotel offers luxury services including a gourmet restaurant and a spa.
Elegantly decorated, all soundproofed rooms have a flat-screen TV with pay-per-view channels, Bluetooth sound system, and a safe deposit box with plug for charging laptop devices. Most of the room types have a private bathroom with a free-standing bath, velour bathrobe and luxury toiletries. Most of the rooms have a balcony with city views.
The 3 Michelin-starred restaurant, Lasarte, offers a range of options designed by the chef Martin Berasategui; while the on-site bistro-style restaurant, Oria, serves fresh cuisine following the Mediterranean gastronomy.
Monument Hotel is a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas; regular trains to Barcelona El Prat Airport leave from Paseo de Gracia Train Station, located 984 feet away. Free high-speed WiFi is provided.
The hotel is housed on Enric Batllo’s house, an architectural jewel of 19th century that constitutes one of the characteristic works of the Eixample Quadrat d'Or and which gives it the Specialty Monument status.

Allegro Barcelona is a futuristic design hotel, located 328 feet from Barcelona’s Diagonal Metro Station. Its stylish rooms include free Wi-Fi, digital radio and LCD TV with satellite channels.
Each room at Allegro Barcelona features elegant white décor with colorful touches. Rooms are air-conditioned and come with an electronic safe. Bathrooms include a hairdryer and toiletries.
A continental breakfast buffet is served until 10:30 each day at Allegro Barcelona. Numerous tapas bars and pavement cafés can be found on Rambla de Catalunya, a 5-minute walk away.
Other facilities include portable WiFi for no charge.
The famous Gaudi buildings and designer shops of Passeig de Gracia are just 1640 feet from the hotel, while Plaza Catalunya is a 15-minute walk away. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about Barcelona, recommend excursions and arrange airport transfers.

Aramunt Apartments offers modern, stylish studios 10 minutes' walk from Passeig de Gràcia Metro Station. It features free Wi-Fi, and a terrace with sun loungers and a small swimming pool of 18 feet by 1.
Aramunt offers bright, well-equipped studios for 2 to 4 people, They have air conditioning, a kitchenette with a washer dryer and a dishwasher, a dining area, and a seating area with a flat-screen TV and a double sofa bed. The bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries.
The property is just a few minutes' walk from numerous tourist attractions. On the nearby Passeig de Gràcia you will find world-famous examples of Modernist architecture, such as Casa Batlló and La Pedrera.
The cultural heart of the Catalan capital, around Plaça Catalunya and Las Ramblas, is just a 10-minute stroll away.
As a guest of the Aramunt Apartments you enjoy free access to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum. Pay public parking can be found next to the property and busses to Barceloneta's beaches stop outside.

Vincci Bit is located just 10 minutes walk from Mar Bella beach. Located a 7-minute walk from El Maresme Forum Metro Station, it features a sauna, a gym and a rooftop swimming pool with city views.
The restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and à la carte meals, including gluten-free products. There is also a lounge, bar and room service available.
The air-conditioned rooms at Vincci Bit are bright and comfortable and feature a flat-screen TV, a pillow menu and a mini-bar. The private bathrooms include a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Free Wi-Fi is also available.
There are a number of bars, restaurants and shops within a few minutes' walk from the hotel. Diagonal Mar Shopping Center is just 984 feet away.
The International Convention Center (CCIB) is a 9-minute walk from Vincci Bit. The historic center of Barcelona can be reached in just 15-minutes by metro or tram.

Set in the heart of Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, Aparthotel Arai 4* Superior features an outdoor swimming pool, a gym with a sauna, and a rooftop terrace with city views. from its two terraces with jacuzzi.
The Arai is set in an 18th-century building and features stunning frescos on the façades, which are part of the architectural Heritage, historical and artistic of Barcelona, which gives it the Specialty Monument status.
Rooms feature a stylish, rustic décor with exposed stone walls and large windows. The air-conditioned rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. They have a sofa and a small kitchenette with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. Private bathrooms include free toiletries and a hairdryer.
Aparthotel Arai features Restaurant Palosanto, a classic tavern offering  tapas and Kokka, the first Peruvian bar in Barcelona.
Las Ramblas Avenue and Liceu Metro Station are just 5 minutes’ walk away. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, 3117 feet away. Barcelona’s Port Vell is 10 minutes’ walk from Aparthotel Arai 4* Superior.

Featuring a roof terrace and free Wi-Fi, Flor Parks is set on Barcelona’s Las Ramblas, beside Liceu Metro Station. Located 650 ft from La Boqueria Market, it offers soundproofed rooms.
The Flor Parks' air conditioned rooms have a balcony, satellite TV and a minibar. Their private bathrooms have hairdryers and some have hydro-massage bathtubs.
Set menu and regular menu options are served at the Hotel Flor’s restaurant. A continental breakfast is available. There is also a snack bar and cafe.
The hotel’s central location makes it perfect for exploring the city’s Gothic Quarter and Barcelona Cathedral is just a 10-minute walk away. The Port and Maremagnum Shopping Center are less than half a mile from the Flor Parks.

This modern hotel offers free Wi-Fi and spacious, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV. NH Barcelona Eixample is a quarter mile from Hospital Clínic Metro Station, in the Eixample district.
The NH Barcelona Eixample is a 15-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard and Plaza Catalunya Square. Barcelona Sants Train Station is within 2 metro stops of the property, and Gaudí’s Sagrada Família Church is 3 stops away.
Rooms at the NH Barcelona Eixample feature simple, functional décor and hardwood floors. They all include a minibar and a selection of pillows. The marble bathrooms provide a hairdryer and a range of toiletries.
The hotel’s breakfast buffet includes typical pastries, fresh fruit and Spanish cured ham.

Negresco Princess is located in Barcelona in the Catalonia Region. The hotel has an outdoor pool and sun terrace, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant.
Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.  For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. Negresco Princess features free WiFi throughout the property.
There is a 24-hour front desk at the property.
Plaça Catalunya is 1312 feet from Negresco Princess, while Portal de l'Angel is 1640 feet away. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 8.1 mi from Negresco Princess.

Vincci Marítimo is a 10-minute walk from Barcelona’s Diagonal Mar Shopping Center and the CCIB Convention Centre. It has bright, stylish rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi throughout.
The air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Marítimo feature modern décor, with parquet floors and relaxing images of the sea. They include a pillow menu and the private bathrooms contain a hairdryer. Rooms offer views of the charming Japanese Zen garden or Diagonal Mar Park.
The hotel’s Jardí de Mar Restaurant serves Mediterranean food using fresh ingredients. The hotel's breakfast includes products for celiacs. The Ikebana Lounge Bar has snacks, tapas and cocktails which can be enjoyed on the terrace.
The hotel’s front desk is open 24 hours a day, allowing you greater flexibility during your stay. Laundry and car rental services are also available from the front desk.
The Vincci Marítimo is just over a quarter mile from Mar Bella Beach. Selva de Mar Metro Station is a 2-minute walk from the hotel, connecting you to the center of the city in 15 minutes.

Ocean Drive Barcelona features air-conditioned rooms with satellite flat-screen TV in the Eixample district of Barcelona. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a seasonal outdoor pool. Guests can enjoy a selection of international cuisine in the in-house restaurant.
At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk. Featuring a private bathroom, rooms at Ocean Drive Barcelona also offer free WiFi. All guest rooms include a wardrobe.
Buffet and à la carte breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodations.
Guests will have free access to Urquinaona Holmes Place Gym, 2625 feet from the hotel. Ocean Drive Barcelona offers a terrace.
Casa Batllo is 984 feet from the hotel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 8.1 mi away.

Featuring air conditioning, Casa Abamita offers accommodations in Barcelona. Plaça Catalunya is 1969 feet from the property. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.
The accommodations offers studios and rooms. The studios are equipped with a kitchenette with a ceramic hob. Both roomms and studios have, a  flat-screen TV, microwave and fridge. All have a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are featured.
Portal de l'Angel is 1969 feet from Casa Abamita, while La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 2297 feet away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 8.1 mi from Casa Abamita.

Pestana Arena Barcelona is less than 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Plaza Espanya and Fira Exhibition Center. It offers a gym, sauna and modern, air-conditioned rooms with free wired internet access.
Some rooms offers free use of the Maritimo Meeting Room, up to 12 people, for private meetings.
Pestana Arena Barcelona is just 3 minutes’ walk from Las Arenas Shopping Center and you can walk to Sants Station in 8 minutes. You can get to the Rambla in 5 minutes from Plaza Espanya Metro.
Rooms feature parquet floors and stylish décor. Each one has work desk, a pillow menu and an LCD TV with satellite channels.
The hotel’s restaurant serves Mediterranean food and has a terrace. There is also a bar where you can get a snack or a drink. The hotel's breakfast includes products for celiacs.

Offering a 1960’s vibe and rooms with vintage décor, this hotel is set in the heart of Barcelona, only 2 minutes’ walk from the famous Ramblas.  Free Wi-Fi is available throughout.
Each air-conditioned room at Sixties Ramblas features a TV and a private bathroom. Most rooms have a balcony.
Sixties Ramblas has a bar and a restaurant. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide tourist information about the area. Bike rental services are also available, and there is also a stylish white billiards table.
The nearest Metro Station is Drassanes, only 2 minutes’ walk from the hotel. You can also walk to the harbor or Plaza Catalunya Square in less than 10 minutes.
Sixties Ramblas is close to the Born district, with numerous trendy bars and restaurants serving local and international food.

Featuring free WiFi and air conditioning, Apartamentos DV is located in Barcelona, 2625 feet from Camp Nou. Palau Sant Jordi is 1.7 mi from the property. Free private parking is available on site.
Offering views over a patio, each apartment comes with a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen including a microwave, kettle and kitchenware. Apartments come with a bathroom with a double ended bath and hairdryer is available on prior request. Apartments are cleaned every day and bed linen and towels are provided. Superior apartments have a spa bath.
Plenty of restaurants, bars and shops are within 5 minutes' walk.
Montjuïc is 1.8 mi from Apartamentos DV, while Casa Batllo is 2.4 mi away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 5.6 mi from the property.

Set at the foot of Montjuic Hill, this design aparthotel is a 10-minute walk from Plaza Espanya Metro Station and the Airport Bus Stop. It offers free WiFi and a rooftop terrace with a solarium and a seasonal swimming pool.
The BCN Montjuic is a 5-minute walk from Las Arenas Shopping Center and a short walk from the Olympic Stadium. Barcelona city center can be reached in 15 minutes by bus or Metro.
All modern rooms at the Montjuic have air conditioning and heating. They include a flat-screen TV, a seating area and a kitchen with a fridge and microwave.
The apartments also include a living area with a sofa bed, a private bathroom and an equipped kitchen with a washing machine. Bed linen and towels are provided.
The Aparthotel Bcn Montjuic has a TV room, as well as a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk, where guests can arrange to visit local attractions. Laundry service is also available.

Set on Las Ramblas and next to Plaza Catalunya, the Hotel Continental offers charming rooms with free high-speed Wi-Fi and a fridge. A free continental buffet is available 24 hours a day.
Decorated in pink, the Continental's air-conditioned rooms include a private bathroom and flat-screen TV with satellite channels. A microwave and crockery set are provided, and guests are welcome to fill the in-room fridge with food from the buffet.
Hotel Continental Barcelona operates a 24-hour reception, allowing guests flexibility during their stay. Currency exchange and car rental can be arranged at the hotel’s tour desk.
The hotel is a 1-minute walk from Catalunya Metro Station. The Raval and the Gothic districts are a 10-minute walk from the Continental Hotel. Barcelona’s Museum of Contemporary Art is 984 feet away.

The Hotel Millenni is a boutique hotel set 165 ft from the Parallel Metro Station. It features a small roof terrace with a hot tub and impressive city views. All rooms are stylish and provided with free Wi-Fi.
The accommodations at the Millenni are brightly decorated. The climate-controlled rooms feature satellite TV and a fully-equipped bathroom.
A breakfast buffet is served daily and there are several traditional bars and restaurants in the surrounding Raval district.
Guests have access to the gym, the hot tub and the sauna. There are 2 computers which have internet access, as well as a small library with daily newspapers. There is also a lounge area where guests can watch the TV.
The famous Las Ramblas are just a 10-minute walk from the hotel. The funicular train to Montjuïc Castle leaves from the nearby Metro station.

Located 492 feet from Llacuna Metro Station, Derby Republica offers modern loft-style apartments featuring exposed brick walls. Guests have access to a rooftop pool and sun terrace with views over Barcelona.
The air-conditioned apartments at Derby include a kitchen equipped with a microwave, hob, fridge and dishwasher. There is also a washing machine, and bedding and towels are provided.
The Republica has a concierge service that can help organize activities such as tours and water sports. Guests can also enjoy free entry to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum.
Glories Shopping Center is a 10-minute walk away from Derby Republica. The beach and Poble Nou Park are also just 15 minutes’ walk away.

Aparthotel Bertrán is in a quiet part of Barcelona, a 5 minute walk from Avinguda Tibidabo FGC Station and Vallcarca Metro. It features spacious accommodations, a gym and an outdoor pool.
Each air-conditioned Bertrán apartment has a living room with satellite TV and a sofa. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer, and there is a kitchenette with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker.
Some apartments have a private balcony with table and chairs. All apartments have free Wi-Fi.
A continental breakfast is available at the Bertrán, and you can have breakfast in your apartment. There is a grocery store 2 minutes away by foot.
There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can rent a car at the tour desk. On-site parking is available for an extra charge.
You can reach central Barcelona in 15 minutes by train, Metro or bus, and there is a night bus stop nearby. Parc Güell is just over half a mile away.

column18:
This hotel offers a free gym and a roof terrace with a seasonal outdoor pool and panoramic views of Barcelona. The rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.
Novotel Barcelona City is located next to Glòries Shopping Center and the Agbar Tower, designed by Jean Nouvel. The Sagrada Familia Basilica and Bogatell Beach are both a 20-minute walk away.
The air-conditioned rooms at Novotel Barcelona City have simple, modern décor. Up to 2 children under 16 stay for free when sharing with parents.
The hotel’s restaurant offers characteristic Mediterranean food.
On the rooftop there is an outdoor swimming pool and a gourmet bar where guests can enjoy tapas, wines and cocktails enjoying panoramic city views.
Staff at reception are happy to provide information about Barcelona. Tram and bus services to the city center stop outside the hotel. Glòries Metro Station is just 984 feet away.

column4: Iberostar Selection Paseo de Gracia 4 Sup
column17: Iberostar Selection Paseo de Gracia 4 Sup
column18:
Located right on Plaça Catalunya Square in Barcelona, Iberostar Selection Paseo de Gracia offers a terrace with a pool and free WiFi throughout. Private parking is available on site.
Awarded as Hotel Monument by the Gremi d'Hotels of Barcelona
Rooms are spacious and come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with a shower. Some rooms offer city views.
You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property and there is a restaurant and a bar on site.
Barcelona's La Rambla is 984 feet from Iberostar Selection Paseo de Gracia, while Paseo de Gracia, with its trendy shops and restaurants, is just 164 feet away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 8.1 mi from the property.

The Petit Palace Boqueria Garden is set in a historic 19th-century building by La Boqueria Market, 33 feet from Las Ramblas, and offers free high-speed WiFi and free bicycle use (subject to availability).
Each room at the Petit Palace Boqueria Garden includes a flat-screen TV and laptop safe, and a private bathroom. The hotel also offers an electric scooter hire service, subject to availability.
The hotel's bar is set by a private courtyard and garden with hundred-year-old trees, a listed site of architectural heritage in Barcelona.
Petit Palace Boqueria Garden is located in Barcelona's Gothic Quarter, just a 1-minute walk from Liceu Metro Station, offering convenient transport around the city. Plaça Catalunya Square is 2625 feet away, and you can walk to Barcelona Port in 8 minutes.

BYPILLOW House offers air-conditioned rooms with balcony and free WiFi and private parking. The property is 984 feet from Maragall Metro Station connected to famous Sagrada Familia and o the popular sandy Barceloneta Beach in Barcelona.
Fitted with wooden floor, bright rooms have an private bathroom with free toiletries and bath or shower. Suites come with 2 separate areas with 2 double beds.
Busses to the city center leave from a bus station located 656 feet away. Plaza Catalunya is 30 minutes by public transports and you can reach fashionable Passeig de Gracia in 20 minutes by metro.

Located in a pedestrianized street in the neighborhood of Borne, Aparthotel Allada 3* offers a tranquil atmosphere due to the scarcity of street noise and the sound-proofing of the building.
Aparthotel Allada 3* is located in a picturesque, historical area that has maintained the façades and arches of the 17th century, while incorporating the modern architecture of the 21st century. The apartments and studios have been designed to offer the greatest comfort and functionality during your stay. All also benefit from ample natural light throughout the day.
The Borne district is full of winding streets that form a labyrinth, allowing you to find some of the most intriguing areas in the old city. Close to the apartments, you will find the church of Saint Mary, the city gardens, the Picasso museum, the chocolate museum, the Cathedral, the market of Saint Catherine as well as many other sites of interest. In addition, you enjoy free access to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum.

Hotel Ramblas Internacional is set right on the famous Las Ramblas, 164 feet from Liceu Metro Station and close to La Boquería Market.
Each of the soundproofed rooms is individually decorated and has plenty of natural light. Most rooms offer views of central Barcelona and some look onto Las Ramblas.
Hotel Ramblas Internacional serves a daily breakfast.
Located just 492 feet from Liceu Theater, the hotel has easy access to Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter and the city’s cathedral is less than 10 minutes’ walk away.

Located in Barcelona, a 7-minute walk from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Hotel Brick Barcelona features views of the city. Among the facilities at this property are a business center and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel has family rooms.
The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel Brick Barcelona the rooms come with bed linen and towels.
Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help.
Sants Railway Station is a 14-minute walk from the accommodation, while Palau Sant Jordi is 1.1 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona-El Prat Airport, 6.2 miles from Hotel Brick Barcelona.

Set 660 yards from Barcelona’s central Passeig de Gracia, Hotel Europark offers a rooftop terrace with outdoor pool. The stylish rooms include a 32-inch LCD TV and free Wi-Fi access.
Each air-conditioned room at the Europark has elegant black and white décor. There is a laptop safe and minibar, as well as a modern bathroom with hairdryer.
Hotel Europark has a cafe-bar and a breakfast room, where a varied buffet breakfast is served. A free early-morning coffee service is also available.
The hotel is a 15-minute walk from Plaça Catalunya and Las Ramblas. Girona Metro Station is just 220 yards away and provides direct access to Barceloneta Beach and the Gothic Quarter.

Featuring a charming garden terrace, Praktik Garden is located 1312 feet from Barcelona’s fashionable Passeig de Gracia Boulevard. Fully reburbished in 2015, its chic rooms feature colorful mosaic floors, a flat-screen TV and free WiFi.
Girona Metro Station is just around the corner from the hotel. From there guests can reach the city’s Barceloneta Beach in 15 minutes. Plaça Catalunya is 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel.
All rooms at the Praktik Garden are equipped with air conditioning and some rooms have balconies. The modern bathroom includes a shower.
Guests can relax in the hotel lounge or on the furnished garden terrace. The hotel provides vending machines for drinks 24-hours a day.

Hotel Del Comte is 328 feet from Barcelona's Urgell Metro Station and 15 minutes walk from the Rambla and Plaza Espanya. It offers modern rooms with free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.
The air-conditioned rooms at Del Comte feature parquet floors and smart design. Each one comes with a work desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.
Staff at the Del Comte Hotel’s 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona.
There is a bus stop just 3 minutes’ walk from the Del Comte which provides transport connections to Barcelona El Prat Airport. It is only 2 stops on the Metro to Plaza Catalunya, Barcelona’s main square.

column17: Torre Melina, a Gran Meliá Hotel

Set in 25,000 square yards of beautiful gardens and offering fantastic views of Barcelona, Torre Melina, a Gran Meliá Hotel is a luxury hotel set on Diagonal Avenue.
With unique experiences that will make this accommodations a benchmark in the Catalan capital, with access to the Palau de Congressos de Catalunya, the gardens of Torre Melina, and signature restaurants such as Erre Errechu and a cocktail bar by Erik Lorincz.
Spacious, air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen TV, a mini-bar and a private bathroom with hairdryer and free toiletries.
The Torre Melina, a Gran Meliá Hotel is 15 minutes walk from FC Barcelona Camp Nou stadium. Zona Universitaria Metro Stop is 1476 feet away, connecting you with the city center in under 20 minutes.
Opening dates of the hotel's different spaces: Erre Urrechu 21.02, Chroma 15.04, Gala Terrace Easter - End of March, Beso Barcelona Restaurant May, Rooftop June and Spa May.

This stylish hotel offers a gym and free Wi-Fi. It is set on a quiet street just 6 minutes’ walk from Bogatell Beach and 984 feet from Llacuna Metro Station.
The bright, air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel 4 Barcelona hotel are modern and elegant, with wooden floors. All have flat-screen satellite TV, and some have views of the sea or city.
The Hotel 4 Barcelona’s restaurant offers Mediterranean dishes, and there is also a stylish bar. The surrounding area has several popular restaurants and bars.
The hotel offers a sauna and steam baths, available for an extra cost. The gym is available for an extra cost, and massage can be arranged. It also has a 24-hour reception with bicycle rental
Hotel 4 is set in the 22@ Technological District, 0.6 mi from Ciutadella Park and 1969 feet from the Olympic Port.

Located in a historic building in the heart of Rambla Catalunya, Mosaic Barcelona by Ona is located in Barcelona, 10 minutes' walk from Plaça Catalunya and 5 minutes' walk from Casa Batllo and La Pedrera. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property
Every room at this hotel is air conditioned, and features a flat-screen TV and modern décor. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. The rooms include a private bathroom fitted with a shower.
Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. The hotel also offers car hire.
Due to its central location, several bars and restaurants can be found nearby.
The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 9.3 mi from Mosaic Barcelona by Ona.

Third person sharing in room is available for Superior room, Junior Suite and Superior Suite.

Located just 984 feet from Parallel Avenue and metro station, Barcelona Fifteen central Aparthotel offers modern, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen cable TV.
The stylish rooms include a private bathroom, coffee making facilities, and a breakfast bar. The property also has studios with a kitchenette.
The property has a rooftop terrace where you can relax. There is also a communal washing machine, drier and microwave, which guests can use for free.
There is a wide range of restaurants and bars in the surrounding area and Parallel’s many theaters are also near to the guest house.
Las Ramblas Avenue is a 5-minute walk away and Barcelona’s Port Vell just 12 minutes’ walk. Airport buses leave from Plaza Espanya and Plaza Catalunya, which are both 20 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Fifteen Luxury.

Wilson Boutique Hotel is located on Barcelona’s Avinguda Diagonal, 12 minutes’ walk from La Pedrera in Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers free Wi-Fi, stylish décor and a rooftop terrace with impressive city views.
The Wilson Boutique Hotel has soundproofed rooms with chic, contemporary design. All rooms are bright with large windows. Each has a flat-screen TV and air conditioning.
The hotel is within walking distance of Plaza de Catalunya which features a range of shops and restaurants.
The Wilson Boutique has excellent transport links. Many busses, including the sightseeing bus, stop opposite the hotel.
The hotel offers free use of the PC and printer in the lobby. There is also a tour desk, where guests can receive information on Barcelona’s tourist attractions, including Gaudí’s Casa Batlló which is around 20 minutes’ walk from the Wilson. Diagonal Metro Station is 2461 feet away.

Conveniently set in Barcelona, Hotel Rec Barcelona - Adults Only provides air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a shared lounge. 1.3 miles from Somorrostro Beach and 1.3 miles from Barceloneta Beach, the property has a terrace and a bar. Private parking is available on site.

Within 164 feet of La Pedrera and Diagonal Metro Station, Hotel Royal Passeig de Gracia features a terrace bar with panoramic views of Barcelona. This 4-star hotel also has an interior garden.
Hotel Royal Passeig de Gracia is set in a restored building with contemporary architecture. The smart bedrooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi and a bathroom with a rain-effect shower.
Casa Batlló is just 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel, while Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are 2 stops from Diagonal Station.
The Gràcia district is within a 5-minute walk, and charming street cafés can be found along the tree-lined Rambla de Catalunya, 656 feet away.

H TOP BCN City is located next to the impressive Hospital Sant Pau and 10 minutes’ walk from the Sagrada Familia. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a TV.
