The H TOP BCN City has a 24-hour reception, allowing you greater flexibility during your stay. There is also an internet corner with computers that you can use for free.
The hotel has vending machines for snacks and drinks. There is a variety of restaurants and bars within 10 minutes’ walk.
Sant Pau-Dos de Maig Metro Station is just 656 feet away from the H TOP BCN City, connecting you with the rest of the city with ease.

Hotel Brummell is a 20-room boutique hotel located a few steps from the Miró Foundation and The Grec theater. Guests will benefit from free and unlimited yoga classes. A running club, for both guests and locals, is organized regularly.
The hotel features an outdoor pool, a garden and a sauna. T-training and boxing session are hosted at the well-being center The Loft.
All rooms boast modern furniture and artwork by young European designers. Each one is equipped with a safe, coffee and tea facilities and a yoga mat. The private bathroom has a rain shower, a high-powered hairdryer and free toiletries by MMLL. Suites have a private, furnished terrace with an outdoor bath.
Brummell Kitchen offers a seated buffet breakfast with homemade granola, local products and fresh orange juice. Guest will also have 24h/7 access to the our self service Honesty Bar, with a selection of drinks, tasty snacks and other delights.
You will also enjoy our on site restaurant Palo Cortao restaurant. A revisited taverna with twisted classic flavor and dishesm and a great wine menu.
Hotel Brummell is just a 15-minute walk from La Rambla and the closest metro station is Parallel Metro Station, 820 ft away.

Please note that the swimming pool will be closed for maintenance from the 1 till the 23 of December.

Nobu Hotel Barcelona offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information on Barcelona’s many attractions, including the MACBA Museum and Barcelona Cathedral, which can be reached in 10 minutes by foot. The Condal is less than 0.6 mi from Port Vell Marina.

Kitchenettes include a ceramic stove and a microwave. The elegant bathrooms have a bathtub or shower. Towels and amenities are also provided.

Housed in a 19th- century modernist building, just behind La Pedrera, H10 Casa Mimosa offers an impressive chill-out terrace with a plunge pool and a sun lounger area with privileged views of Casa Milà’s terrace.
All rooms are outward-facing, with both views over Pau Claris Street or over the courtyard garden which has Gaudí’s chimneys in the background. All have smart temperature control and high-quality amenities including a Nespresso Coffee Machine and a digital safe box. Some rooms also have spacious terraces.
The on-site El Til•ler Restaurant serves a delicious breakfast with a buffet consisting of natural products and a selection of à la carte dishes. The Lobby Bar also offers light meals and is also an excellent meeting point for a drink.
The beautiful garden retains some former cabins which are located in a courtyard that is characteristic of the Eixample district; and has a large variety of Mediterranean greenery such as a century-old palm tree, an impressive lime tree and mimosas, which give the hotel’s name. In the garden there is also an elevated swimming pool and a sun lounger area.
From here, there is access to the Las Cocheras meeting room, a former garage with high-ceilings and a capacity up to 100 people.
Ideally located, H10 Casa Mimosa is 10 minutes’ walk from Casa Battló; Plaza Catalunya and Ramblas can be reached within 15 minutes’ walk. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout.

Set in the heart of Barcelona’s Gothic District, Hotel California is only 2 minutes’ walk from La Rambla. The hotel offers rooms with a balcony, air conditioning and free Wi-Fi.
Each soundproofed room includes a flat-screen TV and wardrobe.The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are provided.
A breakfast buffet is available at Hotel Califorina, which also offers a bar and room service. Guests can enjoy a shared lounge.
La Boqueria Market is located 984 feet from the property, while Plaça Catalunya is 10 minutes’ walk away. La Barceloneta Beach can be reached in 20 minutes on foot. Liceu Metro Station is 656 feet from the hotel

NH Barcelona Entenza is 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Sants Station and high-speed AVE Station. La Fira Exhibition Center is 0.9 mi away. All air-conditioned rooms are spacious, soundproofed and offer free Wi-Fi.
Rooms in the NH Barcelona Entenza Hotel are bright and modern with wooden floors. They feature satellite TV, mini-bar and a fully equipped bathroom with hairdryer.
A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel and breakfast in the room is available. One of Barcelona’s main streets, Diagonal Avenue, is a 10-minute walk from the hotel, with many restaurants and shops.
The NH Barcelona Entenza is in a quiet area but is well-connected to the city center by Metro. Entença Metro Station is 656 feet away. FC Barcelona's Camp Nou Stadium is 3 stops away by Metro.

column17: Room con baño privado sagrada familia
column18:
Room con baño privado sagrada familia is located in Barcelona, just 1.4 miles from Casa Batllo and 1.7 miles from Passeig de Gracia. The property is around 1.8 miles from Bogatell Beach, a 5-minute walk from Sagrada Familia, and 1.2 miles from La Pedrera. Free Wifi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 1.6 miles away.
The condo hotel has 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the condo hotel.
Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.7 miles from the condo hotel, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 1.9 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona-El Prat Airport, 9.3 miles from Room con baño privado sagrada familia.

Located 656 feet from Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue with its many shops and restaurants, Arenas offers modern rooms with TV.
A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel’s restaurant.
A public car park is located 3 minutes away from the hotel.
Arenas Atiram is a 15-minute walk from the Camp Nou Football Stadium. Maria Cristina Metro Station is 656 feet away and L’Illa Shopping Center is a 10-minute walk away.

Located in Barcelona's Sarria District, Atenea Rekord Suites is a 10-minute train ride from Plaza Catalunya. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property
Spacious and comfortable rooms with modern décor come with satellite TV, a safe and Nespresso coffee machine. Each one has a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.
The Rekord Café offers a buffet breakfast.
Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona.
The surrounding area offers a selection of restaurants, shops and lounge bars. Muntaner Train Station is just 164 feet from the hotel.

Set on Barcelona’s fashionable Passeig de Gràcia, the luxurious Mandarin Oriental, Barcelona is within 5 minutes’ walk of Gaudi’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera. Plaça Catalunya is just a 10-minute walk away. The hotel features a spa, rooftop pool, indoor pool, fitness center, wonderful city views, and 24-hour room service.
The spacious rooms feature bright, minimalist design. They include a home theater, a seating area, large flat-screen TV, CD and DVD player. Bathrooms have large bathtubs or showers, and include Acqua di Parma free toiletries, a bathrobe and slippers.
Additionally, you can dine al fresco in the Mimosa garden, and discover Terrat, the rooftop terrace, where guests can enjoy cocktails and Peruvian food. Banker's bar is also serves cocktails and tapas.
Mandarin Oriental spa offers a wide range of treatments. Spa access is free and includes the indoor pool, hot tub, Hammam and 24-hour gym. The spa also features suites for couples. Headphones, towels and chilled drinks are provided for the gym.
There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Parking is available nearby for an extra charge.

Located in Barcelona, a 12-minute walk from Forum Beach, Hotel Tembo Barcelona has accommodations with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a shared lounge and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers a bar. The property provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transportation, a concierge service and free WiFi throughout the property.
The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a closet, an electric tea pot, a fridge, a dishwasher, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel Tembo Barcelona the rooms include bed linen and towels.
A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation.
Platja del Litoral is a 18-minute walk from Hotel Tembo Barcelona, while Llevant is one mile from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona-El Prat Airport, 11 miles from the hotel.

Casa Bella Gracia by Aspasios is less than 5 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gràcia and Diagonal Avenue. This boutique hotel features 11 attractive rooms.
Our accommodations has been completely renewed in December 2023. The modern furnishings of the rooms, designed by interior design experts, and every detail have been carefully selected to offer you a unique experience during your stay in Barcelona.
Each room at Casa Bella Gracia by Aspasios has contemporary décor finished in sand colors. All rooms have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi, as well as a kettle, a coffee machine and a safety box.
A range of cafés, bars and restaurants can be found in the surrounding Gràcia district. The charming squares at Plaza del Sol and Plaza de la Vila de Gràcia can be reached in 10 minutes by foot.
Diagonal Metro Station is just 1312 feet away and is 3 stops from Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas. Gaudí’s La Pedrera is less than 10 minutes’ walk from the Bella Gracia.

Centrally located in the enchanting Gothic Quarter, close to Plaza Catalunya Square and the Ramblas, this fresh and modern hotel features design rooms and a 24-hour coffee and drinks service in the lobby.
The Denit offers the chance to enjoy fun and contemporary design. You can enjoy the soothing, calm atmosphere of the bedrooms created by the fresh mix of pale wood and white furnishings.
Sleep soundly in the Denit’s soundproof rooms. They include free Wi-Fi, a plasma-screen TV and an iPod dock.
Start your day with a fantastic continental breakfast where the modern décor continues along with a tasty selection of cold dishes to prepare you for the busy day ahead.
Explore the vibrant city by foot, with most attractions just a short walk form the Denit’s entrance. Soak up the Medieval atmosphere of the hotel’s immediate surroundings.

Featuring a rooftop swimming pool, Mercer Hotel Barcelona is in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, within a 10 minute walk of Las Ramblas. This boutique hotel is in one of the city’s ancient buildings, next to the Roman walls.
The stylish rooms at Mercer Hotel Barcelona have chic décor with original wood beam ceilings and exposed brick walls. There is free Wi-Fi, air conditioning and flat-screen satellite TV. The bathroom has a rain-effect shower.
The hotel features an interior courtyard with orange trees. There is also a poolside bar and a terrace with lounge chairs.
Several cafés, bars and restaurants can be found in the charming, winding streets and pretty squares surrounding the hotel.
Jaume I Metro Station is just a 5 minute walk from the Mercer. The trendy Born district is approximately 1000 ft away, while Barcelona Cathedral can be reached in 5 minutes by foot.

Located just off famous La Rambla Boulevard in central Barcelona, Hotel Rialto occupies a historic building where the artist Joan Miró was born. It offers air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TV.
Each room at the Rialto Hotel Barcelona has wooden floors and a simple, functional design. The modern bathrooms include basic toiletries. Safes are available to rent.
Guests can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast and delicious Mediterranean meals at the Rialto’s Miró restaurant. There are also many restaurants and lively bars in the surrounding streets. 
Hotel Rialto’s 24-hour reception offers information about the city. The Boquería Market and Barcelona Cathedral are both within 1312 feet. Liceu Metro Station is only 984 feet away, and Plaza Catalunya is a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

Located in central Barcelona, 656 feet from Tetuan Metro Station, Hotel Casa Bonay is a boutique hotel offering a shared terrace and free WiFi throughout. Plaça Catalunya is 10 minutes’ walk away.
Set in a 19th-century Neoclassical residential building, all rooms at Hotel Casa Bonay hotel are soundproofed and combine traditional features such as mosaic floors and modern textiles, lighting and furniture. They come with a mini-bar filled with local refreshments and snacks, complimentary WiFi, premium TV, selected magazines, air conditioning and ceiling fans in most rooms. The bathroom comes with natural soap from Mailin+Getz. Some rooms include a sofa, a terrace or balcony.
Casa Bonay hotel also offers a dynamic and unique culinary experience. Guests will find a Satan’s Coffee Corner café and Bodega Bonay's cuisine on site.
The popular Passeig de Gracia Street, with shops and restaurants, is 2297 feet away.  A 20-minute walk will take you to Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia. Barceloneta Beach is 4 metro stops away from Hotel Casa Bonay.

Offering a central location, Barcelona Century Hotel is located in the Eixample district, just a short walk from the Ramblas and Passeig de Gracia. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout.
All air-conditioned rooms at this hotel are soundproofed and come with satellite TV, safe, mini-bar and a private bathroom with hairdryer.
The hotel offers buffet breakfast as well as a bar. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can provide tourist information about the area.
Barcelona’s main shopping district can be reach within walking distance of the hotel. You can visit Barcelona’s Cathedral or the Gothic Quarter.
Urgell, Hospital Clínic or Universitat Metro Stations are less than 7 minutes’ walk of Barcelona Century Hotel.

This hotel, located in the Gothic heart of Barcelona near the Cathedral, enjoys an ideal location for visiting the sights of this exciting city.
Hotel Suizo has modern facilities and comfortable rooms with satellite TV and air conditioning. Watch the world go by from the bedroom with a balcony overlooking the streets of Barcelona’s Gothic quarter, or relax in the Suizo’s lounge.
Wander in the labyrinth of narrow streets surrounding the impressive Barcelona Cathedral, just 200 yards from the hotel. A short walk takes you to the famous Ramblas, with its colorful street performers and sidewalk cafes.
Walk down to the old port or the beach, or take the metro to visit other areas of the city. A metro station next to the Hotel Suizo makes getting around on public transportation easy.

Just 1969 feet from Passeig de Gràcia, numa l Roca Rooms & Apartments offers spacious air-conditioned rooms with beautiful vintage décor, free Wi-Fi and tea and coffee-making facilities. Girona Metro Station is a 1-minute walk away.
numa l Roca Rooms & Apartments´s individually decorated rooms offer interactive LED TVs with satellite channels. Some rooms have access to a patio or balcony. The stylish bathrooms feature a rain shower, hairdryer and toiletries.
Located in the Eixample district, numa l Roca Rooms & Apartments is a 10-minute walk from the famous Gaudi buildings of Casa Batlló and La Pedrera. The beach is just 4 Metro stops away.
Trains to Barcelona Airport stop at Passeig de Gracia Train Station, a 5-minute walk away.

Hotel Cantón is located in central Barcelona, less than 984 feet from Las Ramblas and the city’s Old Port. It offers 24-hour reception and rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access throughout.
The Cantón has brightly decorated rooms with private bathrooms. Each has a fridge, air conditioning and heating.
The Cantón serves a daily breakfast and has a vending machine selling hot drinks. Guests can make use of the hotel’s TV room, where there is also computer.
The Cantón has easy access to many of Barcelona’s tourist attractions and has a tour desk. Plaza Reial is less than 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel and there are several bars and restaurants within walking distance.
Drassanes Metro Station is under 1640 feet from the Cantón and Sants Train Station is 5 stops away.

This design hotel is right next to Plaza Catalunya in the center of Barcelona. It has a rooftop garden terrace and offers free high-speed WiFi.
Set in a 19th-Century building, the hotel features modern, elegant décor. Its rooms include free tea and coffee, air conditioning, heating, and flat-screen satellite TV. The private bathrooms include luxury cosmetics. Some rooms have a private balcony.
A varied buffet breakfast with zero-mile and homemade products is served. Gluten-free breakfasts can be requested.
Hotel Pulitzer Barcelona has a gastronomic restaurant with a terrace, lobby bar and library. Around 100 live music sessions take place on the terrace throughout the year.
The 24-hour reception offers services such as bike and scooter rental, massages and personal training or yoga sessions.
The Hotel Pulitzer Barcelona has a Biosphere Responsible Tourism certificate.

Featuring air conditioning, DreamKeys Barcelona City offers accommodations in Barcelona. Passeig de Gracia Boulevard and Gaudís La Pedrera and Casa Batlló are a 10-minute walk away.
The property offers apartments and rooms. There is a seating and/or dining area in some units. There is also a kitchen in some of the units, equipped with a dishwasher and oven. Towels and bed linen are featured.
The property offers grocery delivery and packed lunches. You will also find many restaurants, bars and shops in the surrounding area.
Plaça Catalunya is 1.2 mi from DreamKeys Barcelona City. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 7.5 mi from DreamKeys - Barcelona City.

Hotel Santa Marta is just 325 ft from Barcelona’s fashionable Born area and França Train Station. It offers simple, air-conditioned rooms with TV, tile floors and private bathrooms.
Barceloneta Metro station is about 215 yards away, and the bars of Barceloneta are a 5-minute walk from the property. The Gothic Quarter is also just over a quarter mile away.
Hotel Santa Marta provides vending machines with drinks and snacks. There is a parking lot a 5-minute walk from the property.

Abba Rambla Hotel is in the Raval District, just over a quarter mile from Las Ramblas and Liceu Metro Station. It includes free Wi-Fi and a terrace.
The modern, air-conditioned rooms at Abba Rambla feature satellite TV, a safe and minibar. The private bathroom comes equipped with a hairdryer and amenities. Some rooms have a balcony with views.
There is a cafe-bar, where guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Room service and pizza delivery are available.
There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can rent a bike or car from the tour desk. Parking can be reserved near the hotel for an additional charge. Attractions including La Boqueria Market and the MACBA Museum are a 5-minute walk away.

Set at the heart of historical Barcelona and near to many of its most popular sites, this carefully restored hotel is set in a charming, Neoclassical building.
The spacious rooms in the AinB B&B Eixample-Muntaner are elegantly decorated with organic colors to highlight the original features of the building.
Splendid decor includes soothing white walls punctuated by Barroque furniture and all is highlighted by plenty of natural light.
The hotel features a communal lounge and kitchen, allowing you to prepare your own meals before heading out to explore the city. Both the kitchen and the lounge are shared in the AinB B&B Eixample-Muntaner.
Stroll from this guest accommodations to the famous Las Ramblas  less than 5 minutes away by foot. Nearby are the spectacular Modernist buildings of La Pedrera and Casa Batlló  the well-known architectural work of Antoni Gaudí.
In the evening you can explore the neighborhoods of Raval and the Gothic Quarter, where you will find numerous restaurants, bars and nightclubs.

column17: limehome Barcelona Carrer de Fontcoberta - Digital Access
column18:
Located in Barcelona, 1.1 miles from Camp Nou, limehome Barcelona Carrer de Fontcoberta - Digital Access has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and express check-in and check-out. The property is around 1.7 miles from Sants Railway Station, 2.4 miles from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 2.6 miles from La Pedrera. The hotel has family rooms.
All rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. The rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At limehome Barcelona Carrer de Fontcoberta - Digital Access every room is equipped with bed linen and towels.
Casa Batllo is 2.7 miles from the accommodation, while Passeig de Gracia is 3 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona-El Prat Airport, 7.5 miles from limehome Barcelona Carrer de Fontcoberta - Digital Access.

Hotel Regina is set in a historic 19th-century building, just 164 feet from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas. The hotel offers free high-speed WiFi and modern rooms.
The century-old hotel was founded in 1917 and features beautiful architecture, including its impressive art nouveau entrance.
The Hotel Regina’s spacious rooms come with air conditioning, central heating and satellite TV. There is free tea and coffee, a safe, work desk and mini-bar. The private bathroom includes ecological cosmetics and a hairdryer. Some rooms have a balcony.
A varied buffet breakfast with zero-mile and homemade products is served. There is also a bar and room service is offered all day from 07:00 to 00:00.
The Regina has a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera, on Passeig de Gràcia Avenue, are within a 10-minute walk away. Catalunya Metro and Train Station and the airport bus stop are within 5 minutes' walk.

Enjoying from an ideal location right opposite the sea in Barcelona's Gothic Quarter, Serras Barcelona is a 5-star hotel with a rooftop infinity pool and with our Restaurant Informal by our Michelin Starred chef Marc Gascons . Free WiFi access is available.
Set in a historic building where the famous painter Pablo Picasso started his career in 1896, the hotel preserves the building's original façade. Luxurious services like airport pick-up, limousine, concierge and valet parking are standard in this hotel.
All stylish rooms at Serras are air conditioned and soundproofed, featuring a private balcony with views of Barcelona's Port Vell or Mercè Street in the Gothic Quarter. Each comes with state-of-the-art facilities such as a Smart HD TV, wireless sound system and bathrooms with bathrobes and slippers.
Featuring attractive sea views, guests can have a signature cocktail on the stylish lounge in the rooftop terrace, while listening to chill-out music. The mezzanine level in Serras Barcelona features a cozy library with bar, while the restaurant serves Catalan specialties and Mediterranean tapas. The restaurant opens for breakfast, lunch and dinner.
This boutique hotel is 10 minutes' walk from Picasso Museum and Estaciò de França Railway Station. Plaça Reial Square is 2133 feet away, and Santa María del Mar Cathedral is 1640 feet away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 minutes by car.

Well situated in Barcelona, chic&basic Habana Hoose provides air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers a concierge service and a tour desk. The property is non-smoking throughout and is located a 18-minute walk from Somorrostro Beach.
At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Rooms include a safety deposit box, while selected rooms here will provide you with a balcony and others also have city views. All guest rooms feature a closet.
Around-the-clock assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak Catalan, English and Spanish.
Popular points of interest near chic&basic Habana Hoose include Sant Miquel Beach, Barceloneta Beach and Barcelona Cathedral. The nearest airport is Barcelona-El Prat, 7.5 miles from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Featuring beautiful, stylish rooms Hotel Ciutadella Barcelona has an ideal central setting within 320 yards of Santa María del Mar Church, Ciutadella Park and Barceloneta Metro Station. It has easy access to the historic Born and Gothic districts.
Each air-conditioned room at Hotel Ciutadella Barcelona has contemporary décor. All rooms have a TV and a private bathroom.
Bars and cafés can be found along Passeig del Born, 650 ft away. There are several seafood restaurants along the seaside Passeig de Joan de Borbó, a 5-minute walk from the Hotel Ciutadella.
The nearest beaches can be reached in 15 minutes by foot. Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are within 1 mile of the hotel.

Located in Barcelona, 0.7 mi from Casa Batllo, The Corner Hotel provides accommodations with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a bar and a terrace. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.
All units at the hotel include air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels,and a private bathroom with a bath or shower, bathrobes and slippers. At The Corner Hotel every room comes with bed linen and towels.
A buffet breakfast is available daily at the accommodations.
Popular points of interest near The Corner Hotel include Passeig de Gracia, Plaça Catalunya and La Pedrera. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 7.5 mi from the hotel.

Offering a fantastic location, right on the famous Ramblas, next to Plaza Cataluña Square and Barcelona’s main shopping area, this hotel features a 24-hour front desk and free Wi-Fi throughout the property.
Rooms at Hotel Toledano Ramblas include satellite TV, desk and a private bathroom. Some rooms have air conditioning.
This hotel is close to the Aerobus bus stop, which takes you to Barcelona International Airport. Plaza Cataluña or Liceu metro stations are less than a 4 minute walk of the hotel.
Numerous bars and restaurants serving national and international food can be found nearby.

column17: Best Western Plus Hotel Alfa Aeropuerto
column18:
Best Western Alfa Aeropuerto offers free airport shuttle service (please check the schedules), a heated pool and free Wi-Fi. It is under 15 minutes’ drive from El Prat Airport and 12 minutes from the Barcelona Fira Trade Fair.
Air-conditioned rooms at the Alfa Aeropuerto feature satellite TV( between 43" to 50") with Chromecast technology, mini-bar and safety deposit box.
The hotel restaurant, Gran Mercat, serves a range of cuisine and also offers an à la carte option. Guests can make use of the hotel lounge, bar and terrace. The fitness center is equipped with treadmills, air bikes and Crossfit equipment.
The Alfa Aeropuerto is located in Barcelona's largest industrial estate, next to Mercabarna wholesale market. It is a 30-minute bus ride from Barcelona’s Ramblas. There is a bus stop outside the hotel, and on-site parking is available.

H10 Itaca is within 10 minutes’ walk of Sants Train Station, the AVE High-Speed Railway, Plaza España and the FIRA Exhibition Center. It features a stylish 2297 ft² terrace with a plunge pool.
Each bright room at this modern hotel includes free Wi-Fi, a safe, a flat-screen TV, a mini-bar and a desk. They all have a private bathroom including a hairdryer and Textures Collection amenities.
Barcelona city center, including Plaza Catalunya and Passeig de Gràcia, can be reached in 10 minutes by Metro, and FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium is just 2 stops away. Sants Station runs local and national rail services, including the airport train and the AVE link to central Madrid.
Hotel H10 Itaca offers a free welcome glass of cava for all guests. The hotel features a smart restaurant serving signature cuisine and you can enjoy a drink in the chic lobby. The relaxing terrace features sofas and comfortable chairs set under parasols, ideal for enjoying a cocktail.
The Itaca also features a fitness room and a sauna. There is a business corner open 24 hours a day. Free national and international newspapers are provided.

This elegant hotel is set in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, in an impressive, colonial, stone building with a clock tower. It is a 10-minute walk from Barcelona Cathedral and Barceloneta Beach.
Hotel Colonial’s bright, air-conditioned rooms feature wooden floors. They are soundproofed and have a flat-screen TV and mini-bar. You can hire the safe, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.
A buffet breakfast is served in the Colonial Hotel café. Guests can relax with a free newspaper in the stylish lounge, with its white leather sofas, where Wi-Fi is free of charge.
Barcelona Hotel Colonial has a tour desk. Barcelona Marina and the boutiques of the trendy Born district are 5 minutes’ walk away. Parking is also available within a 5-minute walk of the property.

Get the celebrity treatment with world-class service at W Barcelona
W Barcelona is a striking sail-like structure next to Barceloneta Beach, offering breathtaking design and fantastic views over Barcelona. It features a spa, infinity pool, rooftop bar and luxurious rooms.
The W Hotel’s impressive rooms feature avant-garde design and views of the Mediterranean or the city. They all come with a chaise lounge, flat-screen TV, iPod docking station and rainfall shower.
The W has a stylish gourmet restaurant, FIRE; and you can enjoy a cocktail with panoramic views over the city and sea at NOXE rooftop bar, located on the 26th floor. Cocktails are also offered in the W Lounge. The SALT Beach Club & Restaurant has a menu of innovative burgers accompanied by specially designed cocktails to live the ultimate burger by the beach experience.
There are two pools, SUN Deck and WET Deck, which are surrounded by decking with loungers. The hotel also has direct beach access. Facilities at the W Spa include a hot tub, sauna and steam room, and a brand new relaxation area, GETAWAY, is available from 2018. A wide range of relaxation and beauty treatments is available.
The W is 20 minutes’ walk from Barceloneta Metro Station, and buses stop outside the hotel.

Just 325 ft off Barcelona’s central Plaça Catalunya and the exciting Las Ramblas, this new hotel features a 19th-century façade with 21st-century decor and facilities.
The H10 Universitat is in the cultural heart of this cosmopolitan city, allowing you to easily walk to many of the city’s unique sights. It is full of stylish, contemporary design and modern art. State-of-the-art amenities include free Wi-Fi available throughout the building.

Offering air-conditioned rooms in the Horta-Guinardó district of Barcelona, Atica Apartments - by Weflating is a 12-minute walk from Sagrada Familia. Among the facilities at this property are an elevator and luggage storage space, along with free Wifi throughout the property. The accommodation offers a concierge service, private check-in and check-out, and organizing tours for guests.
The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge, and stovetop are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the condo hotel, the units come with bed linen and towels.
A mini-market is available at the condo hotel.
La Pedrera is 1.7 miles from the condo hotel, while Casa Batllo is 2.1 miles away. The nearest airport is Barcelona-El Prat, 10 miles from Atica Apartments - by Weflating, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

column4: Hotel Midmost by Majestic Hotel Group
column17: Hotel Midmost by Majestic Hotel Group
column18:
Located in the heart of Barcelona, Hotel Midmost by Majestic Hotel Group is a few steps from the famous Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter. This stylish hotel features a roof terrace with a pool (not climatized) and views over the city.
The Hotel Midmost by Majestic Hotel Group has elegant interiors with all modern comforts. Relax in a sunny bedroom with attached bathroom, decorated in soothing soft colors and with air conditioning, free WiFi, satellite TV and a Nespresso coffee machine.
Treat yourself to a delicious meal in the hotel’s restaurant, or step outside to sample the huge range of regional and international foods in one of Barcelona’s many restaurants.
Take a stroll up the impressive Passeig de Gracia to visit the famous Modernista creations of Gaudi, or visit the colorful Ramblas and the mouthwatering food stalls of the Boqueria market.

El hotel boutique Casa Llimona está situado en la planta principal de un antiguo palacete construido en 1890. Recién reformado con total detalle se ha mantenido intacto el encanto de la época y con exquisito gusto se han seleccionado los muebles y materiales nuevos.
Todas las habitaciones están equipadas con aire acondicionado, TV de pantalla plana, ventanas de doble acristalamiento, baño privado con bañera o ducha, secador de pelo y caja fuerte.
La recepción está disponible las 24 horas, y se ofrece un ligero desayuno de 8h a 10h todas las mañanas.
El hotel boutique Casa Llimona está muy bien ubicado, a tan sólo a 8 minutos a pie de la Casa Batlló y a 10 minutos a pie de la plaza Cataluña y las Ramblas.
Se ofrece WiFi de alta velocidad gratuita en todas las zonas.

Majestic Hotel & Spa Barcelona GL offers luxurious accommodations in a neoclassical building on Passeig de Gràcia. It features a spa and an outdoor unheated plunge-pool on the rooftop with amazing views of the city.
The Majestic Hotel Barcelona maintains its original façade and its stylish, modern rooms feature attractive, classic décor. Each has air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. The apartments are located at an independent building next to the hotel.
SOLC Restaurant, located on the first floor, is a tribute to catalan and traditional cuisine. There is also a piano bar, Bar del Majestic, with live music in the evenings. During the summer guests can enjoy Dolce Vitae Cocktail Bar, which is located by the pool and overlooks Barcelona
The spa features steam baths, a sauna and offers a range of treatments. There is also a fitness center.
Gaudí’s Casa Batlló is just 328 feet from Majestic Barcelona. Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are just 10 minutes’ walk away.

Casual Colors Barcelona is set approximately 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Sants Railway Station and 656 feet from Avinguda Diagonal. This functional hotel offers comfortable rooms and free Wi-Fi.
Casual Colors offers simple, attractive décor. Each of its air-conditioned rooms has a TV and mini-bar.
The property has easy access to Barcelona’s main attractions. Las Ramblas and the city’s old town can be reached in approximately 15 minutes from either Sants or Entença Metro Stations.
The hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast. Staff at the 24-hour reception can arrange restaurant reservations and provide information on the city’s attractions.
Sants Metro Station connects guests to La Fira Exhibition Center and Plaza de España in just 3 stops. The airport bus also stops here.
